Description:
Are you excited to drive the digital transformation and unlock the potential of data and cloud for a new era of possibilities? Are you motivated to be an integral part of our Operational Excellence team in one of the world’s leading pharmaceutical companies?
We are looking for our new Cloud Engineer to support our team data platform and help build and maintain the cloud infrastructure in our Digitalization team in Novo Nordisk, in Hillerød. Apply today and join us for a life-changing career!

Description:
About the job:

We are looking for our new Cloud Engineer to help build and maintain the automation services of the foundational cloud infrastructure in our Cloud Foundation team in Saxo. The team delivers automation for provisioning core infrastructure components, security and cost control. Today our focus is Microsoft Azure Cloud and private cloud (on-prem), but in the future our services might support other cloud platforms.
Cloud Foundation works closely with the other infrastructure teams in Saxo, (e.g. Enterprise Information & Data, Monitoring & Logging, Network, Container Platforms) and with Enterprise Architects to build pillars for a modern hybrid application hosting platform to enable our development teams to build high performance, highly resilient and reliable applications and services.
Cloud Foundation provides cost-effective and secure IaaS and PaaS Azure cloud resources via automation platforms to the developer community in Saxo.

Job_title: Data engineer med øje for den tværgående arkitektur
Description:
Om stillingen Statens BI sikrer, at beslutninger træffes på et oplyst og korrekt grundlag. Med data som fundament gør vi viden tilgængelig og visualiseret i den kontekst som vores kunder ønsker.

Vi har et klart og tydeligt mål om at skabe gennemsigtighed for den enkelte regnskabsbruger og at understøtte styring og resultatskabelse i de enkelte institutioner. Samtidigt skal vi opfylde Finansministeriets behov for konsolidering af viden og tværgående analyser i forbindelse med udarbejdelse af finansloven.

Det er et spændende, kompliceret og et særdeles aktuelt arbejde, hvor den enkeltes indsats kan måles direkte i de beslutninger, der træffes. BI er et strategisk vigtigt indsatsområde i Finansministeriet, hvilket afspejles i vores arbejde og den gode energi, hvormed vi tilgår vores opgaver.

Statens BI undergår konstant forandring og i takt med den teknologiske udvikling ændres brugernes behov. Derfor er vi gået i gang med at definere den næste generation af Statens BI, så hvis du vil være med til at forme fremtidens forretningsservices og teknologi for Statens BI, er det nu du skal med på rejsen.

Vi søger lige nu en eller flere data engineers, der i samarbejde med vores Product Owners, kan skabe sammenhæng på tværs af løsninger og arkitektur og sikre, at vi følger best practics. Statens BI er bygget på teknologi fra Microsoft.

Om dig Vi ser gerne, at du har følgende færdigheder:


Du vil blandt andet komme til at arbejde med:


Derudover vil du indgå i arbejdet med at definere og implementere den næste generation af Statens BI.

Om os Vi garanterer et meningsfuldt job, hvor faglige udfordringer og personlig udvikling er i fokus fra første dag. Vores BI-team består af 17 gode kollegaer, hvor faglighed og godt humør er i højsædet, for det skal være sjovt at gå på arbejde.

BI-teamet indgår i Økonomistyrelsens Center for Systemer, som er et af de største it-udviklingsmiljøer i staten. I Systemcenteret er vi i alt 160 dygtige og ambitiøse it-specialister, der arbejder med it-udvikling, drift, support, infrastruktur, arkitektur og sikkerhed – alt sammen i tæt dialog med og inddragelse af vores kunder.

Hos os betyder tilstedeværelse sammen med vores kollegaer meget, og vi mener, at samarbejde og videndeling på tværs af styrelsen er afgørende for et godt arbejdsmiljø. Samtidig vil vi gerne sikre fleksibilitet for vores medarbejdere, og hjemmearbejde kan løbende aftales mellem chef og medarbejder, når det er foreneligt med opgavevaretagelsen.

Ansættelsesvilkår Du ansættes efter gældende overenskomst med mulighed for forhandling alt efter kvalifikationer.

Det er en forudsætning for ansættelse, at du kan sikkerhedsgodkendes til graden hemmeligt og efterfølgende kan opretholde sikkerhedsgodkendelsen i hele din ansættelsesperiode.

Ansættelsesområdet er Finansministeriet med tilhørende institutioner, pt. Finansministeriets departement, Statens Administration, Statens It, Økonomistyrelsen samt Medarbejder- og Kompetencestyrelsen.

Yderligere oplysninger Hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte teamleder Morten Bødtcher på tlf. 20 35 01 79.

Ansøgning Vi ser frem til at modtage din ansøgning med CV, eksamenspapirer og eventuelle bilag via knappen ”Søg stillingen” senest den 17. april 2023.

Finansministeriet ser mangfoldighed som en styrke og opfordrer alle interesserede kandidater uanset personlig baggrund til at søge. Vi ser frem til at læse din ansøgning.

Description:
Who we are
At EIVEE, we’re on a mission to make a sustainable world possible and profitable. To achieve this, we target carbon emissions as well as costs, knowing that Procurement plays a foundational role in driving sustainability impacts and compliance. Because without transparency into what you buy and from where, how would you know how much that product or service emits?
We offer a state-of-the-art product that provides businesses with a high-quality and validated overview of their climate footprint and cost transparency with automated expert insights, and we do this through an innovative and ground-breaking SaaS-like business development platform. With our recently announced seed round of 4M€ and so many businesses that may benefit from our help, our market size is almost unlimited, and our growth potential enormous – which is why we need you.

At Alfa Laval, we always go that extra mile to overcome the toughest challenges. Our driving force is to accelerate success for our customers, people, and planet. You can only achieve that by having dedicated people with a curious mind. Curiosity is the spark behind great ideas. And great ideas drive progress.
As a member of our team, you thrive in a truly diverse and inclusive workplace based on care and empowerment. You are here to make a difference. Constantly building bridges to the future with sustainable solutions that have an impact on our planet’s most urgent problems. Making the world a better place. Every day.
Who you are
Like us, you are curious. You ask questions and you seek out the solutions. You are interested in overcoming challenges and devising solutions. You’re also forward-thinking and eager to develop both personally and professionally.
About the job
With this position you will become a part of the Connected Solutions team, we are responsible for driving new business within Connected Products. We work with IoT and data-driven solutions for our outstanding products for the hygienic industry.

One of 3Shape priorities is to utilize cloud providers for us to deliver services internally as well as externally to our customers. To do so, we are growing our services in Microsoft Azure, our primary cloud provider.
We are using our cloud providers for IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, and to support us going forward we want to grow our capabilities and responsibilities by building a Cloud Center of Excellence.
We are looking for a Cloud Engineer who preferably has operations experience. The position is in a team who is currently involved in DevOps for a number of projects, however it is likely that this team will be part of the future R&D Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE).
The team is responsible for some central services in the cloud today, and we want to add more DevOps capabilities to support the projects in the department. Together with the rest of 3Shape we will work on setting the standards for DevOps in Azure including helping the projects adding more focus on Infrastructure as Code, monitoring, and assisting the teams managing the infrastructure.

Description:
Vice President – Engineering (Network Design)

Reports to: SVP Engineering

Location: Copenhagen (Global HQ) / London - Preferred.
Other location like Bangalore (India) can be considered.

Maersk deploys $13Bn+ in assets (ships, planes, trucks, etc.) to connect the world and enable global trade. The incumbent will take executive ownership of the E2E transportation network design, optimization, and execution, starting from designing the network and respective transportation products, to making sure each customer order is delivered as promised. This role will take responsibility for the design (incl. architecture, technology choices, etc.) and day-to-day operations overseeing the and operational aspects of the transportation platform – technical operational excellence as well as outcomes for our customers and colleagues. The team will provide a global structure for customer service including controls and service sessions and protocols for service use. A vital part of the Maersk technology estate, the network platform will bridge other platforms and technologies to serve the customer in the best way possible.

Job_title: Software Engineer, Energy Transition Platform, Hybrid 2+ days on average in our fantastic office! (Full remote available in some cases)
Description:
As an integrated container logistics company, A.P. Moller - Maersk is working to connect and simplify our customers’ supply chains. Every day, we facilitate and impact global trade by offering end-to-end logistics solutions across oceans, ports, air and on land. Our global network enables people in every corner of the world to trade with anyone, anywhere – ultimately creating opportunities for people and communities to thrive, and for businesses to grow.
Why should you work on the Energy Transition Platform?
The world is facing a climate emergency. We see it as our obligation – as an industry leader and with the resources available to us – to do all we can to get to net zero operations as fast as possible and to help our customers decarbonize their global supply chains end to end.
As a key player in an industry responsible for 3.5 billion tons of annual direct emissions, A.P. Moller - Maersk (Maersk) is committed to leading the decarbonization of logistics and taking responsibility to be part of the solution, enabling a green and just transition. In early 2022, we announced the ambitious goal of advancing the target year for our commitment to reach net zero emissions by a full decade, to 2040. This applies to our own operations, but – even more importantly – covers all three emission scopes and supports our customers’ own climate commitments.

Job_title: Senior Digital Hardware Engineer – Leading subsea technology
Description:
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a Senior Digital Hardware Engineer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Description:
Are you looking for a key role in a fun and modern AWS team and currently work as a cloud platform engineer? Come and join us! You will help us evolve and expand our platform capabilities to enable our business to work with data in a smart and modern manner.
Join our team and grasp this great opportunity to become a Analytics Platform Engineer with our AWS team in Stockholm. I am Robert Lönn and lead our team of platform experts within Data and Analytics in Telia Company. We are building the new hybrid cloud foundation and capabilities for the whole of Telia Company’s Analytics, BI and Machine Learning domain.
Do you want to grow with us?
We need to enhance our platform’s capabilities with Machine Learning services, big data processing (Glue/EMR), Real time streaming (Kinesis/Kafka) data governance, improve CI/CD, generate guidelines and support in some of the data architecture and best practices questions. Your role would be to, in collaboration with your team members and other teams, focus on us successfully delivering that.

Description:
Brænder du for at arbejde med applikationsdrift og kundekontakt? Er du typen der kan lide forskelligartede tekniske driftsopgaver, samt at gøre nye opgaver skalérbare og driftssikre? Er du struktureret og lærelysten af natur? Vil du være med til at sikre kontinuerlig, stabil levering af data til vores kunder?

Bliv en del af System Operations-afdelingen i Kamstrup
Kamstrup er en dansk teknologivirksomhed, som blev grundlagt i 1946 og som har medarbejdere i mere end 20 lande og hovedkontor i Stilling syd for Aarhus. Vi mener ikke, at nogen bør skulle stille spørgsmål ved deres adgang til rent vand eller udsigten til en fremtid med bæredygtig energi. Vores intelligente måleløsninger gør forsyningsselskaber og samfund i stand til at reducere vandtab og øge energieffektiviteten, idet de får indsigt at handle på og data til at tilpasse deres indsatser. Vi oplever en betydelig efterspørgsel efter vores produkter, og for at understøtte vores vækst udvider vi nu vores team.

Job_title: Cloud udvikler (studiejob) - Cutting Edge(React, Javascript, Python, AWS, Linux etc. )
Description:
ARNVIND GROUP søger endnu en dygtig studiejob-udvikler til Cloud applikationsudvikling - og herunder Python, og React.js / Javascript udvikling.
Vi er et softwarehus, som udvikler cutting edge cloud software med anvendelse af bl.a. Smart Machines / Data Science til Life Science området.
ARNVIND GROUP er bl.a. udnævnt som TOP 10 European Advanced Robotic Process Automation companies af det internationale magasin CIO Applications.
Vores marked er fortsat i kraftig vækst - så vi har brug for flere dygtige udviklere :-)
Om dig:

Om stillingen

team.blue Denmark er en af landets største tech-virksomheder, der sælger hosting-løsninger til mere end 250.000 kunder. Vi er den danske del af gruppen team.blue, som er en europæisk tech-gigant med 28 kontorer og ca. 2000 medarbejdere rundt omkring i Europa.
Dit primære fokus bliver Windows-serveradministration, og du kommer til at arbejde med de nyeste teknologier indenfor Microsoft og automatisering. Din primære opgave bliver, sammen med vores dygtige teknikere, at vedligeholde vores Windows-serverfarm bestående af +4.500 Windows-servere og de services vi leverer til vores kunder. Du kommer også til at sidde med den daglige drift og kundehenvendelser. Det er derfor vigtigt, at du ikke er bange for at tage telefonen og ringe direkte til kunden hvis nødvendigt - vi sørger selvfølgelig for, at du får den fornødne viden gennem oplæring og buddyordning.

Want to be a part of the data revolution in sports?
Here’s your opportunity to join our growing data engineering team. The team is responsible for capturing, processing and delivering real time data on athlete performance from our cutting-edge radar and computer vision-based tracking technology. Our products are used by some of the best athletes in the world. Our team is building high performance and flexible data solutions and cloud services. We work closely with our peers in data science, business intelligence and application development, enabling them to focus on delivering compelling product experiences. We focus on the problem of running data operations at scale with a lean team using automation and the latest data frameworks and cloud technologies.

Job_title: Tech Leads til at sætte retning for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence-området i Skatteforvaltningen
Description:
Vil du være med til at udvikle den datadrevne Skatteforvaltning? Og kan du skabe sammenhæng mellem forretningsbehov, teknologier, kompetencer og metoder? Så har vi brug for dig!
Vi søger profiler med et stærkt IT-fagligt fundament, som kan drive udviklingen af Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence-området i Skatteforvaltningen.
Du vil i samarbejde med andre Leads, Enterprise- og løsningsarkitekter og generalister sætte den strategiske retning for udviklingen på DW/BI-området og styrke fagligheden på tværs af Skatteforvaltningen.
Center for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence udvikler og vedligeholder en stor portefølje af løsninger, og derudover har vi en ambition om at hjælpe hele Skatteforvaltningen til at bygge morgendagens fremtidssikrede dataløsninger selv. Hvis vi skal lykkes med det, kræver det de rette teknologivalg, gennemtænkte metoder og ikke mindst, at vi kompetenceudvikler kollegaer i Skatteforvaltningen.

Du skal være med til at løfte en bred vifte af opgaver med strategisk og operationelt sigte, vi er spændte på at høre, hvilken rolle du vil kunne spille hos os.

Job_title: Quantum Processor integration lead for semiconducting platform
Description:
Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computer Programme at Niels Bohr Institute, Faculty of Science, the University of Copenhagen is looking for a Quantum Processor integration lead with effect from 1 June, or earlier.
About us
The Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computing Programme (NQCP) is establishing a talented and diverse international team to create a cutting-edge quantum programme in the heart of Copenhagen. We aim to establish an international quantum computing programme that will drive research and innovations at multiple levels - from developing scalable quantum processor technologies to solutions for the quantum-classical control and readout interface, and all the way to quantum algorithms and applications.
The long-term mission of the programme is to develop fault-tolerant quantum computing hardware and quantum algorithms that solve life-science-relevant chemical and biological problems.

Description:
Overview:
Element Metech søger en koordinator til at supportere vores Total Instrument Management koncept. Et koncept hvor vi koordinerer kundens vedligehold af udstyr, og sørger for at udstyret altid overholder vedligeholdelses pligtige kalibreringer.
Vi ønsker at styrke vores koncept, og søger derfor en koordinator til at planlægge, følge op og samle løse ender.

Hvad tilbyder vi?
Du bliver en del af vores Taastrup afdeling hvor vi er ca. 40 medarbejdere tilknyttet. Her er vores vi primære kunder fra Life Science industrien. Vi samarbejder for at blive endnu bedre og deler dagens udfordringer. Miljøet er præget af en åben og positiv tilgang samt nytænkning i forbindelse med nye udfordringer. Vi er mange specialister, som er dedikerede og brænder for det vi arbejder med.
Vi tilbyder et uformelt arbejdsmiljø, gode kolleger, pensionsordning, sundhedsforsikring, flextids- frugt og frokostordning. Derudover er der gode muligheder for faglig- og personlig udvikling, som er med til at gavne dig og din personlige udvikling - kompetente medarbejdere er det som skaber en god virksomhed.

Description:
Rethink your impact
Are you passionate about fermentation, optimization, and enzymes? Then you might be our new fermentation scientist.

Work for a cause, not just a company
Novozymes is the world’s leading provider of industrial enzymes and microorganisms. Together with our customers, partners, and the global community, we use our innovative thinking and passion for science to boost industries and make everyday products more sustainable for the good of the planet. Our biological solutions enable higher agricultural yields, healthy food consumption, low-temperature washing, energy-efficient production, renewable fuel, and many other biological solutions that the world can benefit from – both today and in years to come. We need people who are eager to try new things, motivated by challenge, and not afraid to fail but driven to try again. And again. We know that original thinking happens when we’re given the flexibility to focus and the freedom to fully unfold our individual strengths. This is key to our innovation power. We call it Rethink Tomorrow.


We are offering an attractive position with the responsibility for fermentation process optimization. We do fermentation process optimization based on in-depth microbial understanding, scientific understanding, pilot experiments, lab investigations, production trials and advanced analytics.
You will be optimizing processes based on scientific knowledge, lab investigations in 20 L scale and AMBR robot, production trials, and identify optimization leads from mathematical and statistical treatment of data. We typically work on projects of 6-12 months’ duration with focus on making significant and value creating process improvements. We work in projects with focus on teamwork. Our team includes 14 fermentation scientists and technicians.
To keep meeting our business targets in a dynamic environment, people development is a focus area in the daily work for all Zymers as well as continuous improvement of the way we work. Interaction with other departments is very strong, using both shared projects and actual job rotations to other departments/functions to foster cooperation and business understanding.


Fermentation Optimization is organized under the “Product and Process Development” area in the “Global Optimization” function, and we have a close collaboration with Downstream Optimization, our other development departments and production facilities in Denmark, China, Brazil, and USA.


Optimizing Novozymes fermentation processes in the Danish factories. The optimization will bring Novozymes savings year after year and capacity release for production of new products for our customers.

: This job will be located in Kalundborg.

Are you passionate about making a sustainable impact, and do you see yourself in this position? Then unlock your passion and apply today!

: April 23rd, 2023.

: For more information, please contact Head of Fermentation Optimization Department, Senior Manager Jan Larsen by phone +45 30773031. Please attach your master diploma when you apply for the job.

At Novozymes we commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants. We recommend you not to attach a cover letter to your application. Instead, please include a few sentences in your resume/CV about why you are applying. To ensure a fair recruitment process, please refrain from adding a photo in your resume/CV.

Novozymes is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. All employment decisions are based on business needs without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, age, disability, or veteran status.


Did you know that every year our products help cut global CO2 emissions by around 90 million tons? Learn more about Novozymes, our purpose, and your career opportunities at
.


Even if this job isn't the right fit for you, perhaps you know someone who might find it interesting. If so, please feel free to share the job link and encourage them to apply. Thank you for your referral! Please check out our other
. The right fit for you could just be a few clicks away.

Job_title: Data Engineer til bekæmpelse af skatteunddragelse
Description:
Vil du være en del af et stærkt fagligt fællesskab? Er du interesseret i at arbejde med komplekse datastrukturer og samfundsvigtige opgaver? Så har vi brug for dig som ny Data Engineer!

Tre tidligere juniorer siger:

”Med forløbet er jeg kommet hurtigt ind i arbejdslivet og er blevet klædt på til at løse opgaver selvstændigt og udvikle effektivt”

” Der har været stort fokus på min udvikling og på at give mig de bedste forudsætninger for at lære. Mine kollegaer har været tålmodige og sikret at arbejdsbyrden ikke har taget overhånd”.



Vi søger flere nyuddannede Data Engineers til vores Data Engineer-forløb, der sætter din læring og kompetenceudvikling i centrum. Du får en unik mulighed for at deltage i et forløb, der er skræddersyet til juniorprofiler, og som giver dig de bedste forudsætninger for at udvikle din faglighed og for at få erfaring i en stor organisation.
DE-forløbet består af oplæg og workshops, som er tilrettelagt, udviklet og afholdt af dine kommende kollegaer i Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence. Forløbet sikrer en effektiv og målrettet onboarding, så du hurtigt får hands-on-erfaring.

Alle teams arbejder agilt inden for SAFe og har et årshjul med fire PI’s. Hvert PI afsluttes med tre dages Hackathon, der giver mere end 140 medarbejdere med forskellige fagligheder mulighed for at samarbejde på tværs om selvvalgte projekter.


Som Data Engineer bliver du en del af et stort fagligt fællesskab i Center for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence, der består af 75+ medarbejdere, både Data Engineers, BI-udviklere, Business Analysts, Product Owners, driftsansvarlige og generalister.
Vi prioriterer tid til sparring og til at dyrke vores faglighed. Vi afholder tre årlige centerdage og et seminar med både interne og eksterne oplæg, workshops og indslag, der skal styrke vores sociale sammenhold og faglighed. Derudover har vi flere fagfællesskaber, hvori de forskellige fagligheder kan vidensdele og løse opgaver, der sikrer udvikling og forbedring af vores område.


Som Data Engineer er du bindeled mellem dataproducent og datakonsument, og du får ansvar for at indsamle, omforme, sammenstille og udveksle data på Skatteforvaltningens mange områder i vores fælles Data Warehouse.

Vi arbejder med SQL og Informatica, som er vores primære databaseværktøj. Informatica kan håndtere hele vores dataintegrations cyklus; fra indlæsning til udstilling. Det forventes ikke, at du har tidligere kendskab til værktøjet, og du vil få en grundig introduktion til det gennem onboardingforløbet.

Din rolle bliver bl.a. at:



Vi forestiller os, at du har en relevant videregående IT-faglig uddannelse, og at du har en særlig interesse for data. Du kan både være nyuddannet eller have erfaring.

Du har oparbejdet kompetencer eller interesser inden for et eller flere af områderne:


Det er desuden en fordel, hvis du har erfaring med programmering i Python, bearbejdning af semistruktureret data (XML, JSON) og ETL-processer generelt.

Koncernsproget er dansk, så vi forventer, at du kan forstå og formulere dig på dansk – både skriftligt og mundtligt.


Din leder i Data Warehouse stiller store krav til sig selv og sine medarbejdere, og har et højt ambitionsniveau på fagområdets vegne, men går ikke på kompromis med medarbejdernes trivsel. Fleksibilitet og en god work-life-balance er grundstenen i et bæredygtigt arbejdsliv. Du får en inkluderende leder, der går ind for åben og ærlig dialog. En leder, der giver ansvar, plads og medbestemmelse – fordi det skal være sjovt at gå på arbejde!


Send din ansøgning med CV, dokumentation for uddannelse samt eventuelt yderligere materiale via linket ”Søg stillingen” senest mandag den 4. juni 2023. Vi indkalder løbende til samtaler.

Stillingen er med opstart 15. august 2023.

Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte kontorchef Astrid Iversen på tlf. 72 37 06 18.

Vi forventer at benytte en personlighedsanalyse og en logisk test i rekrutteringsprocessen. Der vil forud for ansættelsen blive indhentet straffeattest.

Du bliver ansat på overenskomstvilkår i henhold til gældende overenskomst for akademikere i staten, overenskomst for kontorfunktionærer, laboranter og IT-medarbejdere (HK) eller overenskomst for fuldmægtige m.fl. (DTS) i Skatteministeriet.

Ansættelsesområdet er Skatteministeriet med tilhørende institutioner. Arbejdsstedet er Osvald Helmuths Vej 4, 2000 Frederiksberg.

Job_title: Entry Data Platform Engineer - Aarhus or Gdansk
Description:
We are looking for dedicated data engineers for our data platform teams within the Analytics powerhouse in Arla Foods. Join us and help us build and evolve Arla Foods data and analytics platform.

About the Job
You will become part of Arla Analytics Powerhouse (APH) where we deliver data and advanced analytics across Arla’s value chain and enable our colleagues to utilize data. You will work together with either our core platform team, responsible for our cloud based data platform or the team working on the analytical services around the platform. Your skills and knowledge will support the work being done on the platforms and to build up new components and solutions. Specific tasks could be to setup CI/CD pipelines with automated tests, building deployments pipelines utilizing airflow or working on our data catalog component. In this position, you are cooperating with engineers, architects and product owners to continuously improve our platform capabilities and explore new functionalities. Our platform is built as a combination of Azure services and data bricks platform, and we are building supporting solutions around it, e.g. self-service ingestion.

Description:
Data Specialist, Snowflake Engineer - Copenhagen:
30012023DN_1675062009
Data Specialist, Snowflake Engineer - Copenhagen:

A data engineer using Snowflake is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the data infrastructure of an organisation. This includes creating data pipelines to collect, store, and process large datasets, as well as designing and implementing data models to support the organisation's data needs.

The data engineer will work closely with data scientists and analysts to understand the organisation's data requirements and design data systems that can handle the volume, velocity, and variety of data. They will also be responsible for ensuring the data infrastructure is scalable, reliable, and secure.


Key responsibilities of a data engineer using Snowflake include:




The data engineer should have strong technical skills, including experience with Snowflake, SQL, and other relevant technologies. They should also have experience with data modelling, data warehousing, and data pipeline design. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment are also important.

Working in a cross-collaborative way means that the team is focused on achieving the best possible results for the project, rather than just completing their individual tasks. This requires a high level of collaboration and communication among team members, as well as a willingness to share ideas and work together to solve problems.


Even if you feel you aren't a 100% fit, please still apply!

Description:
Help us shape the future of photography
Born out of a passion for photography, we provide photographers with the tools to easily collaborate with clients and creatives, achieve the highest quality photographs, and bring their visions to life. We are on a journey to become the most efficient ecosystem of creative and collaborative tools with a flexible photography workflow seamlessly spanning across multiple devices, letting you work from anywhere and with anyone.

The role
Analytics are at the heart of Capture One’s success. In this role, you will empower the business through connecting the data of our 250K+ global customers, which enables us to turn data into actionable insights in support of our ambitious growth goals. We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to become part of our Data & Insights team. You will build data pipelines to support decision-making across Finance, Marketing, Sales and Product & Technology. You will also have the opportunity to build machine learning models that help us act faster on customer needs. Our data architecture is based on Microsoft’s cloud service Azure, and we primarily use Power BI for our self-serve reporting.

Description:
Blackbird ApS is a spin-off from the consulting company emendo- which specialises in lean manufacturing consultancy. We monitor and collect data in real time from production lines, and enable organisations to immediately start downtime analysis, performance tracking, condition monitoring, OEE, receive alerts for predictive maintenance and much more in order to make continuous improvements in factories. We solve the problem of wasted resources and inadequate capacity utilization of existing production lines through data insight. We are trusted by some of the leading brands within Parma, Food, Beverage and Automotive to significantly improve and stay on top of their OEE. In a world of increased competitiveness, wasted resources and demand for sustainable production, Blackbird is the solution to ensure maximum output from a production line.
Become a part of the Blackbird team and help revolutionize the world of data collection and production monitoring. With Blackbird, people and organizations are empowered through data in a way that is transforming the way they live and work.

Description:
The role
As a Senior Data Engineer at HelloFresh Nordics, you will be part of building a robust and highly performing data platform, models and tools to serve teams across our Nordic markets. You will lead different efforts to build applications and ETLs to automate operational processes and enable data and information flows throughout our business. You will develop distributed services that process data in batch and real-time with a focus on scalability, data quality, and business requirements. You will work on challenging data-related problems and building a self-serve data platform.
As a Senior Data Engineer, you will have the opportunity to help shape the vision for our tooling landscape and define our local tech priorities. You will help guide and develop a talented and ambitious team of data engineers and scientists.

Description:

ningsfrist: Hurtigst muligt
PRAKTIKANT - COMPLIANCE

PRAKTIKANT TIL COMPLIANCE TEAM
Muuto er et internationalt designfirma der arbejder med nutidens førende designere på at skabe nye perspektiver til den skandinaviske designhistorie på tværs af møbler, belysning og accessories. Muuto’s hovedsæde er beliggende i København, Danmark med ansatte verden over.
Muuto er et globalt brand, hvor regionale krav og lovgivning spænder vidt. Muuto stiller yderligere skærpede krav ift. kvalitet, kemi og miljø. Vi søger derfor en praktikant som brænder for compliance.

Description:
Principal Software Engineer (Denmark/UK/Singapore/India)
We are currently looking for a Principal Software Engineer who could be based in Copenhagen - Denmark, Maidenhead - UK, Singapore, or India.
The Principal Software Engineer will report into the Vice President for the Logistics and Services Platform Portfolio Technology Leader. They are trusted by the company to ship complex software, self-direct in line with the company’s objectives, foster team spirit, offer platform-level impact, and increase technology awareness by participating in events and sharing useful content. Also, the Principal Engineer spends most of the time designing/documenting large-scale systems, writing reference code, improving processes, mentoring new senior engineers, providing advice, and setting the bar for quality.
In addition, the Principal Software Engineer facilitates internal discussions and inspires other engineers by directing their work to meet best-in-class and category standards. He or she, therefore, serves both as a role model and a mentor to every single member of the technical team. The right candidate will possess a unique combination of unparalleled dedication to the craft and a fervent desire to transform and improve the technology landscape.

Description:
Your work days are brighter here.
At Workday, it all began with a conversation over breakfast. When our founders met at a sunny California diner, they came up with an idea to revolutionize the enterprise software market. And when we began to rise, one thing that really set us apart was our culture. A culture which was driven by our value of putting our people first. And ever since, the happiness, development, and contribution of every Workmate is central to who we are. Our Workmates believe a healthy employee-centric, collaborative culture is the essential mix of ingredients for success in business. That’s why we look after our people, communities and the planet while still being profitable. Feel encouraged to shine, however that manifests: you don’t need to hide who you are. You can feel the energy and the passion, it's what makes us unique. Inspired to make a brighter work day for all and transform with us to the next stage of our growth journey? Bring your brightest version of you and have a brighter work day here.
About the Team
As we grow the Peakon engineering team at Workday, we are looking for a Backend Engineer to join one of your product teams based in Copenhagen. Peakon teams own their roadmap, work collaboratively and include engineering, UI/UX design, and product management.

The Peakon team at Workday is driven by the belief that we can radically change the world of work. We believe that when an organisation listens to employee feedback and empowers every employee to drive the change they want to see, it can build more fulfilling jobs and grow in ways never before envisioned.

We’re in the business of creating great places to work, so it should be no surprise that being a great place to work is our highest priority. With ambitions as big as ours, we see individual growth and development as the key strategy for growing our business.

Job_title: Customer Success Manager - Enterprise Data Solutions
Description:
About The Job
Customer Success Managers (CSMs) connect our clients to LSEG/Refinitiv’s Enterprise solutions.
The successful CSM, for which this advert is crafted, is part of an international team in EMEA with a breakdown to Nordics & Benelux.
The main region to work with are countries in the Nordics. The CSMs in our team are trusted advisors to their client base and combine relationship management, education, and functional expertise to drive adoption, retention, and growth within their assigned account portfolio.
To achieve this, a Customer Success Manager at LSEG/Refinitiv collaborates with internal teams & roles (Account Managers, Sales Specialists, Customer Support of various levels, data teams, administrative functions, Product & Programme management, Developer Advocates, Solutions Consultants & fellow CSMs).
A multitude of working groups and learning opportunities help our CSMs to ensure their customers fully demonstrate the value of LSEG/Refinitiv within their financial data workflows.

About the job
HARDI INTERNATIONAL A/S are looking for a new colleague in the Product Development Department to work closely with agronomists, designers and suppliers. You will join a dynamic and professional team of approx. 20 colleagues in Denmark, approx. 45 colleagues worldwide, mainly engineers.
To achieve the best solutions, HARDI INTERNATIONAL A/S use professional sparring with team colleagues in an informal social environment.
Your responsibilities

Req ID:408091
Leading societies to a low carbon future, Alstom develops and markets mobility solutions that provide the sustainable foundations for the future of transportation. Our product portfolio ranges from high-speed trains, metros, monorail, and trams to integrated systems, customised services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility solutions. Joining us means joining a caring, responsible, and innovative company where more than 70,000 people lead the way to greener and smarter mobility, worldwide

Denmark has set an ambitious and radical goal - to upgrade the totality of its mainline network. Alstom is there to set their ambition to life and has started the implementation of the state-of-the-art ERTMS level 2 baseline 3 signalling technology, to the trackside and onboard the fleets. This technology is stable and secure, and it will drastically improve the passenger experience by reducing the number of delays and increasing transport capacity.

case closed
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a Production Engineer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. Job_title: Data Engineer with an interest in creating value from data
Description:
We are looking for a dedicated and motivated Data Engineer to join our Digital Asset Management Team at Metro Service. You will play a key role in our Digital Transformation Program, where you will use your experience and interest in data modeling and data solutions to help us reach our targets.
You can make a difference
You will be part of a small dynamic team of four where we work in the intersection of data and Asset Management where decisions can be made, and the purpose is to establish information processes to improve our value creation from our assets via their data.
Metro Service has started a digital journey, where you will drive your own projects and the day -to day work to ensure we reach our targets. Data models, solutions and Governance structures aspects will be planned and developed together with your colleagues.

Job_title: Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager
Description:
Would you like to be part of a team driven by providing best quality results to support the planning, design and realisation of complex nearshore and offshore wind energy related projects? As an internationally operating consulting and R&D company, we offer a specialised and highly dynamic and flexible working environment in a team of world leading metocean and hydrodynamic specialists assisting mainly the offshore wind but also other marine infrastructure markets.
Endorsed by our success and the market growth, we are looking for an enthusiastic, structured, and ambitious Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager to be part of DHI’s Offshore Wind Global Business Unit within Metocean. We have local teams in both our headquarter in Hørsholm, Denmark, and in our United Kingdom office in Southampton.
As a Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager, you'll be undertaking (and/or managing) advanced modelling, analysis and reporting of meteorological, oceanographic and climatology processes to support the design and operation of marine activities and projects worldwide, in particular the offshore wind industry. You will be exposed to both advisory and development/research projects. In addition, you will be responsible of managing projects, mentoring, and training staff globally. As a project manager, it is essential that you have technical in-depth experience with metocean modelling and analyses and having experience in offshore wind would be considered as a bonus.

Description:
Do you want to help us design sustainable solutions for the future renewable energy systems – and contribute to a greener world? As pioneers within wind power, we are committed to develop ground-breaking and competitive products which support our vision of leading the sustainable energy transition.
As one of our new Software or Senior Software Engineers, you will be based at our HQ in Ikast, and join our technology and innovation department. You will be responsible for developing software for electrical systems used in the renewable energy industry. Historically we have been working mainly within the wind industry, but are currently developing our activities outside wind and are expanding our technology teams to support this journey.
You will join an experienced and Scrum-based software team primarily based in Denmark. The team works with solutions ranging from embedded systems to large data accumulation systems as well as wind turbine specific software to some of the largest wind turbine producers. We take pride in having a open and honest dialog where we learn from each other and share both successes and mistakes.

Job_title: Student Assistant- Digital Services for COWI in Lyngby, Denmark
Description:
Application deadline: 09 May 2023 - Denmark - Location: Lyngby - Digital

Student Assistant- Digital Services for COWI in Lyngby, Denmark
Lyngby

Do you want to be a part of a leading international consulting company that creates value and solutions to some of the most complex issues worldwide? Are you a Engineer looking to advance your career in Digital services? Then this is the place to apply your knowledge and curiosity to enable a better tomorrow.

Create Solutions that will enable a better tomorrow
The digital services role involves taking digitization initiatives and ensuring implementation in the department, as well as establishing and maintaining a standardized digital understanding.
We are looking for a student with a solid business understanding and interest in IT, digitalization, and technology. No matter your professional background, skills like coordination talent, cross-disciplinary collaboration, tech curiosity and the ability to handle many different activities simultaneously are key.


Labelling of ground truth for AI purposes.
Quality assessment for AI predictions
Labelling of plates and faces in panoramic images
Quality assessment of calibration test data for our 360 degrees cameras
Quality assessment of color corrections after applying them to the images
Quality assessment of hosted images during the campaign
Archiving (data prep, data queuing, overview of progress, and final cleanup on the server)
Hardware help

We highly value our students and view them as aspiring future experts; We expect that you can work at the office approximately two days a week as appropriate with your education schedule.
COWI is a leader within our field because our employees are leaders within theirs. We invite you to learn from the best and expand your potential in an outstanding environment, where we collaborate on shaping tomorrow's societies. Alongside your manager, you outline the path for your development and build your expertise on a day-to-day basis, working on global and local assignments.

Your skills. Our team. Together we design the future.
The first step to success in this role is that you are eager to collaborate with the people around you, whether they are colleagues, partners, or customers. Developing ties with others is something you do by acting respectfully and delivering on your promises. And you never get set in your ways but keep exploring new insights and ways to improve. To succeed in this position, we believe that you should be a team player with curiosity, courage, and care.


Good verbal and written communication skills in English.
Interest in a creating a career in technology
Interest or knowledge of Python and SQL scripting

A place to work and so much more
At COWI, we work together with our customers to shape a sustainable and liveable world. We do it by applying our knowledge and curiosity – and sometimes even our courage – to create the solutions the world needs today to enable a better tomorrow. That is why we say no to fossil-based projects and aspire to have 100 per cent of our revenue come from activities that move our customers towards sustainability.
We value differences and development and cultivate an environment of belonging and having fun. Because that is what brings out the best in you, at work and at home.
With offices primarily located in Scandinavia, the UK, North America, and India, we are currently 7,300 people who bring their expertise in engineering, architecture, energy, and environment into play.

Got more questions?
If you have any unanswered questions about the role or what we have to offer, please reach out to Michael Olesen, Head of Section mcol@cowi.com.
Get to know us even better at our website, www.cowi.com, where you can learn more about our projects, our strategy, what we want to achieve and what life is like at COWI.

Equal opportunity employer
COWI provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, COWI complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.

Description:
Ballerup

KMD er en af Danmarks største IT-virksomheder og leverer samfundskritiske IT-løsninger både til offentlige myndigheder og private virksomheder. Description:
Med mange spændende og nye projekter på vej, leder vi efter passionerede og dygtige software udviklere til vores dynamiske og voksende team i Aarhus N. Bliv den næste Software Pilot i Trifork.

Full-time · Denmark
Om jobbet og teamet
Som frontend udvikler ved Trifork, vil du blive en del af et agilt og talentfuldt udviklingsteam, hvor det faglige niveau er i top. Du vil blive kastet ud i mange forskellige projekter, med forskellige kunder. Med andre ord, du vil komme til at arbejde med mange spændende projekter, i stedet for at arbejde med det samme projekt, år efter år. Det er derfor vigtigt at du er omstillingsparat, og elsker at få nye udfordringer. Du vil komme til at arbejde med forskellige frontend teknologier med primær fokus indenfor web-udvikling, og du vil kunne påvirke løsningerne med din faglighed, om det så er en bedre teknologi, nye features eller sparing med backend.
Vi ansætter ikke efter en præcis stilling eller opgave, men efter de rigtige mennesker. Til gengæld kan vi tilbyde en fantastisk arbejdsplads, med plads til udvikling i en uformel og faglig stærk arbejdskultur.

Description:
Systemadministrator til dokumenthåndtering i Topsoes Power-to-X udviklingsafdeling
Om os
Hos Topsoe bidrager vi til den grønne omstilling ved at levere teknologi, katalysatorer og services til mange forskellige sektorer. Det er en rejse, vi begyndte på i 1940, da vores grundlægger Dr. Haldor Topsøe skabte en virksomhed, der satte spørgsmålstegn ved mulighedernes grænser og inspirerede andre til at tænke udover det konventionelle og længere end til i morgen. I dag er vi et fællesskab af over 2.000 problemløsere, der arbejder sammen om at finde svarene på verdens største udfordringer. Så uanset om din ekspertise er inden for teknik, drift eller bredere forretningsroller, er vi alle forenet af et ønske om at løse udfordringer.
Vi har hovedkontor i Danmark og har kontorer og aktiviteter globalt. Få mere at vide på topsoe.com

Løsninger baseret på team indsats
System Operations består i dag af 6 medarbejdere, og måske skal du være den syvende og vores nye kollega? Ved os vil du opleve en stærk kultur og et tæt fællesskab med fokus på, at teamet deler ansvaret, og vi hjælper hinanden i løsning af opgaverne.

"Vi vægter løsninger, der er baseret på at et team trækker resultat igennem, fremfor et enkelt individ arbejder tingene igennem hen over natten" Lars Yde, Manager

Vil du udfordre dine færdigheder og udvikle dine kompetencer i et af Danmarks stærkeste innovations miljøer

Praktikken finder sted i Technology Innovation, hvor vi fra et teknisk udgangspunkt arbejder med teknologidreven forretningsudvikling. Vi er cirka 75 ingeniører der arbejder med teknologi dreven forretningsudvikling indenfor vores tre vurderingsvektorer Desirability (Vil kunderne have det?) Feasability (Kan vi gøre det teknisk?) Job_title: Koordinator til fremtidens BI Analytics platform i Forsvaret
Description:
Vil du være et bærende element i en tid hvor cyber, digitalisering og data betyder mere dag for dag? Vi har brug for en engageret koordinator til den fremtidige udvikling af BI & Analytics, som skal være med til at opbygge Forsvarets data.

Business Intelligence og analytics området i Forsvarsministeriets koncern er klar til at tage det næste skridt på sin rejse mod at understøtte koncernen i at blive mere datadrevet.

Om os

Koncern IT er ansvarlig for at drive, vedligeholde og udvikle Forsvarets IT og i det hele taget digitalisere Forsvarsministeriets koncern. Organisationen tæller omkring 700 medarbejdere (ca. 1/3 militære og 2/3 civile) og er dermed blandt de største i den offentlige sektor.

I BI organisationen arbejder vi som et hold og deler både viden og ansvar, og vi har et godt arbejdsmiljø præget af humor, begejstring og gensidig respekt. Vi støtter hinanden i både opgaveløsningen, beslutningsfaserne og vidensdelingen. Du vil stå skulder mod skulder med erfarne og skarpe kolleger, som elsker at dele ud af deres viden og blive udfordret af nye ideer.



Du ansættes i DeMars Business Intelligence sektionen (DBI) som er en del af en BI organisation bestående af fastansatte medarbejdere både fra DBI og fra Departementets BI&A team samt eksterne IT konsulenter. Vi er opdelt i opgaveorienterede teams som i høj grad er selvbestemmende i forhold til opgaveprioriteringen. Stillingen som koordinator i BI vil i høj grad være en del af den tværgående koordinering i vores teams samt støtte til chef BI i forbindelse med administrative opgaver.

DBI har ansvaret for drift, vedligeholdelse og udvikling af Koncernens nuværende BI-platform som er en SAP-baseret Business Warehouse, Business Objects samt Celonis. Vi kigger samtidig på, hvad det naturlige næste skridt er i rejsen for at understøtte den digitale koncern vha. nye BI-værktøjer samt mulighederne i advanced analytics. Det ligger i forlængelse af Forsvarets vision om, at beslutninger i højere grad skal baseres på data.

Der er rig mulighed for at udvikle dig både fagligt og via udfordrende opgaver og opfølgende uddannelse inden for BI og analytics. Dette kan være igennem interne og eksterne kurser.



Din uddannelse er ikke afgørende, det vigtigste er, at du har gode kommunikations- og koordineringsevner og naturligt selvstændigt søger løsninger på udfordringer.

Som person trives du i et arbejdsmiljø, hvor der er fokus på rettidig gennemførsel af planlagte opgaver, samtidig med at prioriteringer i Forsvaret, kan ændre planerne med meget kort varsel.

Du er nysgerrig, har lyst til at lære og kommer med et stort engagement, som du kan bringe i spil. Dine berøringsflader er mange, så du får rig mulighed for udvikling i jobbet, både fagligt og personligt.

Afdelingens ansvarsområde spænder vidt og vi er i gang med en udvikling hen imod et større udvalg af analysemuligheder.

Erfaring med et eller flere af nedenstående teknologier, vil være et plus, men ikke krav:






I øvrigt skal du kunne udtrykke dig flydende på dansk i skrift og tale, ligesom du skal kunne læse og forstå teknisk engelsk.



Du ansættes og aflønnes efter den til enhver tid gældende relevante overenskomst. Der vil i forbindelse med en ansættelse være mulighed for forhandling af tillæg, der modsvarer dine kvalifikationer. Der er til stillingen tilknyttet en arbejdsgiverfinansieret pensionsordning.

Som ansat under Forsvarsministeriets område, er du omfattet af nogle særlige vilkår. Det betyder bl.a., at du skal kunne sikkerhedsgodkendes og opretholde denne gennem hele dit ansættelsesforhold.

Kontakt og ansøgning
Hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Chef for Business Intelligence sektionen Lotte Gjevnøe Mortensen, på FMI-C-CHTDB@MIL.DK eller på telefon 2557 4637.

Hvis du har spørgsmål til løn- og ansættelsesvilkår, er du velkommen til at kontakte Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse, HR-konsulent Nathaly Tobiassen på telefon 3266 5698

Ansøgningsfristen er den 18.04.2023, og vi afholder samtaler løbende, så tøv ikke med at søge allerede i dag! Stillingen er til besættelse snarest muligt, gerne 01.05.2023.



Send os din ansøgning og dit CV via linket i ”søg den ledige stilling”, hvor eksamensbeviser og andre relevante dokumenter ligeledes skal tilføjes.

OM KAPACITETSANSVARLIG KONCERN IT
Vi er en af Danmarks største offentlige leverandører af digitale systemer og services. Vi har mere end 500 højt specialiserede medarbejdere, der arbejder inden for en lang række områder, som fx infrastruktur, IT-arkitektur, netværk og IT-systemer. Det kræver alt fra IT-supportere og projektledere til sociologer og ingeniører. Opgaverne spænder vidt og vi understøtter alt det IT, der følger med forsvarets mange funktioner og enorme mængde materiel – hvad enten det er netværk og telefoner eller IT i kampvogne, i kampfly og på skibe.
Til at understøtte Forsvarets opgaveløsning driver, vedligeholder og udvikler vi en IT-infrastruktur af meget høj kvalitet og kompleksitet, der sikrer effektive og moderne tjenester baseret på efterprøvede teknologier.
Vores mission at levere optimal forretningsværdi gennem IT ved at arbejde hurtigt, forbindende, kundecentrisk og vidensdrevet. Derved sikrer vi, at det samlede forsvar og beredskab kan føre kampen for det, der er værd at kæmpe for.

DBI er en del af Kapacitetsansvarlig Koncern IT (KAKI), som er en division under FMI. KAKI driver, vedligeholder og udvikler koncernens netværk, applikationer og arbejdsstationer. Endvidere driver og udvikler KAKI koncernens SAP-applikation DeMars. KAKI forestår desuden koordinering, planlægning, ressource- og udliciteringsstyring samt sikkerhed og kvalitetsstyring mv. inden for informatikområdet for hele koncernen.

Læser du stadig med?
Og har du lyst til at vide endnu mere om dine karrieremuligheder ved Koncern IT, og hvordan du søger, kan du gøre det hér: www.karriere.forsvaret.dk/job/kaki.

Læs mere om Forsvaret som arbejdsplads på www.Forsvaret.dk

Job_title: Test Automation Engineer - Applications / Global world-leading audio and video technology group
Description:
EXO ARNVIND is looking for a Test Automation Engineer - for our customer a global world-leading audio and video technology group that offers cutting edge headset solutions and services to help people connect and communicate with the world around them. Our customer is part of major Danish Technology Group over 18000 people globally and presence in 130 countries. They are listed on Nasdaq Copenhagen as a blue chip stock

Your voice is needed to enable the smart way of ensuring the quality of complex brand-new deliveries and stay ahead of the software testing game within applications, and applications protocols/APIs.
The Opportunity

Are you an expert-level Data Architect, or do you have a proven track record within scientific data engineering and the ambition to become an expert? Do you want to be part of a global company with a 100-year legacy and 54,000+ colleagues working to impact the lives of millions of people?
Novo Nordisk is investing heavily in new research projects and in the digital foundation required to amplify and accelerate our science, and we are building a new Scientific Architecture team to design and build the software, data products, and platforms that our world leading scientists need.
Become part of the next wave of scientific discovery by joining Digital Science & Innovation (DSI). Apply today and join us for a life-changing career.

Hvidovre skal også i fremtiden være en attraktiv og velfungerende kommune at bo, besøge og drive virksomhed i. Job_title: Quantum Processor integration lead for semiconducting platform
Description:
Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computer Programme at Niels Bohr Institute, Faculty of Science, the University of Copenhagen is looking for a Quantum Processor integration lead with effect from 1 June, or earlier.

About us
The Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computing Programme (NQCP) is establishing a talented and diverse international team to create a cutting-edge quantum programme in the heart of Copenhagen. We aim to establish an international quantum computing programme that will drive research and innovations at multiple levels - from developing scalable quantum processor technologies to solutions for the quantum-classical control and readout interface, and all the way to quantum algorithms and applications.

The long-term mission of the programme is to develop fault-tolerant quantum computing hardware and quantum algorithms that solve life-science-relevant chemical and biological problems.


We are seeking an experienced quantum engineer with expertise in semiconducting spin qubits and integrated circuits involving semiconducting components to the newly established programme, NQCP at the Niels Bohr Institute in Copenhagen, Denmark.

The employee will be focusing on designing, assembling, and advancing state-of-the-art experiments to develop semiconducting components for the generation and processing of quantum information.

The employee will lead the spin qubit and semiconductor platform development at the centre hub, and in close collaboration with superconducting and photonic qubit platform teams, work with chip fabrication, characterization, theory, and simulation teams. The employee will build an international network of collaborators with a main scope of responsibility centring on semiconductor system engineering, including running measurements, data tracking & analysis, and reporting.









Joining NQCP now, you will be involved from the very beginning and contribute to the fulfilment of the mission of NQCP. We want to make Denmark a world leader in quantum research, and we hope to attract people from all over the world.

Life in Denmark is supported with strong social services (free universal healthcare, free/subsidised language courses, paid parental leave, subsidised day care institutions and excellent public schools). Our work culture is very egalitarian and prioritises work life balance. Dual career families are the norm, and workplaces offer flexibility to support everyone in having both an exciting career and good family time. Danish cities are known for having excellent infrastructure, for example through widespread bike path networks. We can also offer a thriving food-scene, excellent museums, and beautiful natural scenery.


The employment and salary are made in accordance with the Circular on the Collective Agreement concerning academics in the state sector concluded between the Ministry of Finance and AC (the Danish Confederation of Professional Associations).

Employment will be as special consultant. The salary is based on seniority. Negotiation for salary supplement is possible. The working time are 37 hours per week on average. The working hours are flexible.
The employment period is limited until 31 December 2029.

Appointment will be subject to receipt of a security clearance.


If you find the job interesting, please send an electronic application with attachment via Jobportalen (click on the link "Apply Now" at the bottom of the post) no later than
Interviews will take place during April.

The University of Copenhagen seeks to reflect society and encourages applications irrespective of personal background.


Any questions about the position may be directed to Peter Krogstrup (krogstrup@nbi.ku.dk).

The Faculty of Science at the University of Copenhagen – or SCIENCE – is Denmark's largest science research and education institution with 4,000 employees and 9,700 Bachelor and Master students in 12 departments. The faculty has an annual budget of DKK 3 billion.

Learn more about The Faculty of Science at www.science.ku.dk .

Job_title: Senior C++ Engineer – LEGO Digital Designer
Description:
Job Description
Have you always wanted to be part of how we create our LEGO models, but your talents are in building amazing software rather than building LEGO models?

As part of our Product Development Technology organization, you will work as a trusted member on one the teams developing the Computer Aided Design software where ‘LEGO creators grow ideas into awesome experiences’. Our software is the birthplace of the LEGO models and building instructions we all know and love. Our teams work directly with our core user groups giving us a unique collaborative environment where we can see and feel the impact our software makes for our colleagues every day.
This position is specifically for the team focusing on enabling creators to author a LEGO building instruction. Here you can expect to work on problems such as: How can we ensure this LEGO building instructions meets our quality standards and best practices? How can we help LEGO building instruction designers have more time to focus on what really matters? How do we define a data model that represents a LEGO building instruction?

Job_title: Koordinator til fremtidens BI Analytics platform i Forsvaret
Description:
Vil du være et bærende element i en tid hvor cyber, digitalisering og data betyder mere dag for dag? Vi har brug for en engageret koordinator til den fremtidige udvikling af BI & Analytics, som skal være med til at opbygge Forsvarets data.

Business Intelligence og analytics området i Forsvarsministeriets koncern er klar til at tage det næste skridt på sin rejse mod at understøtte koncernen i at blive mere datadrevet.

Om os

Koncern IT er ansvarlig for at drive, vedligeholde og udvikle Forsvarets IT og i det hele taget digitalisere Forsvarsministeriets koncern. Organisationen tæller omkring 700 medarbejdere (ca. 1/3 militære og 2/3 civile) og er dermed blandt de største i den offentlige sektor.

I BI organisationen arbejder vi som et hold og deler både viden og ansvar, og vi har et godt arbejdsmiljø præget af humor, begejstring og gensidig respekt. Vi støtter hinanden i både opgaveløsningen, beslutningsfaserne og vidensdelingen. Du vil stå skulder mod skulder med erfarne og skarpe kolleger, som elsker at dele ud af deres viden og blive udfordret af nye ideer.



Du ansættes i DeMars Business Intelligence sektionen (DBI) som er en del af en BI organisation bestående af fastansatte medarbejdere både fra DBI og fra Departementets BI&A team samt eksterne IT konsulenter. Vi er opdelt i opgaveorienterede teams som i høj grad er selvbestemmende i forhold til opgaveprioriteringen. Stillingen som koordinator i BI vil i høj grad være en del af den tværgående koordinering i vores teams samt støtte til chef BI i forbindelse med administrative opgaver.

DBI har ansvaret for drift, vedligeholdelse og udvikling af Koncernens nuværende BI-platform som er en SAP-baseret Business Warehouse, Business Objects samt Celonis. Vi kigger samtidig på, hvad det naturlige næste skridt er i rejsen for at understøtte den digitale koncern vha. nye BI-værktøjer samt mulighederne i advanced analytics. Det ligger i forlængelse af Forsvarets vision om, at beslutninger i højere grad skal baseres på data.

Der er rig mulighed for at udvikle dig både fagligt og via udfordrende opgaver og opfølgende uddannelse inden for BI og analytics. Dette kan være igennem interne og eksterne kurser.



Din uddannelse er ikke afgørende, det vigtigste er, at du har gode kommunikations- og koordineringsevner og naturligt selvstændigt søger løsninger på udfordringer.

Som person trives du i et arbejdsmiljø, hvor der er fokus på rettidig gennemførsel af planlagte opgaver, samtidig med at prioriteringer i Forsvaret, kan ændre planerne med meget kort varsel.

Du er nysgerrig, har lyst til at lære og kommer med et stort engagement, som du kan bringe i spil. Dine berøringsflader er mange, så du får rig mulighed for udvikling i jobbet, både fagligt og personligt.

Afdelingens ansvarsområde spænder vidt og vi er i gang med en udvikling hen imod et større udvalg af analysemuligheder.

Erfaring med et eller flere af nedenstående teknologier, vil være et plus, men ikke krav:






I øvrigt skal du kunne udtrykke dig flydende på dansk i skrift og tale, ligesom du skal kunne læse og forstå teknisk engelsk.



Du ansættes og aflønnes efter den til enhver tid gældende relevante overenskomst. Der vil i forbindelse med en ansættelse være mulighed for forhandling af tillæg, der modsvarer dine kvalifikationer. Der er til stillingen tilknyttet en arbejdsgiverfinansieret pensionsordning.

Som ansat under Forsvarsministeriets område, er du omfattet af nogle særlige vilkår. Det betyder bl.a., at du skal kunne sikkerhedsgodkendes og opretholde denne gennem hele dit ansættelsesforhold.

Kontakt og ansøgning
Hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Chef for Business Intelligence sektionen Lotte Gjevnøe Mortensen, på FMI-C-CHTDB@MIL.DK eller på telefon 2557 4637.

Hvis du har spørgsmål til løn- og ansættelsesvilkår, er du velkommen til at kontakte Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse, HR-konsulent Nathaly Tobiassen på telefon 3266 5698

Ansøgningsfristen er den 18.04.2023, og vi afholder samtaler løbende, så tøv ikke med at søge allerede i dag! Stillingen er til besættelse snarest muligt, gerne 01.05.2023.



Send os din ansøgning og dit CV via linket i ”søg den ledige stilling”, hvor eksamensbeviser og andre relevante dokumenter ligeledes skal tilføjes.

OM KAPACITETSANSVARLIG KONCERN IT
Vi er en af Danmarks største offentlige leverandører af digitale systemer og services. Vi har mere end 500 højt specialiserede medarbejdere, der arbejder inden for en lang række områder, som fx infrastruktur, IT-arkitektur, netværk og IT-systemer. Det kræver alt fra IT-supportere og projektledere til sociologer og ingeniører. Opgaverne spænder vidt og vi understøtter alt det IT, der følger med forsvarets mange funktioner og enorme mængde materiel – hvad enten det er netværk og telefoner eller IT i kampvogne, i kampfly og på skibe.
Til at understøtte Forsvarets opgaveløsning driver, vedligeholder og udvikler vi en IT-infrastruktur af meget høj kvalitet og kompleksitet, der sikrer effektive og moderne tjenester baseret på efterprøvede teknologier.
Vores mission at levere optimal forretningsværdi gennem IT ved at arbejde hurtigt, forbindende, kundecentrisk og vidensdrevet. Derved sikrer vi, at det samlede forsvar og beredskab kan føre kampen for det, der er værd at kæmpe for.

DBI er en del af Kapacitetsansvarlig Koncern IT (KAKI), som er en division under FMI. KAKI driver, vedligeholder og udvikler koncernens netværk, applikationer og arbejdsstationer. Endvidere driver og udvikler KAKI koncernens SAP-applikation DeMars. KAKI forestår desuden koordinering, planlægning, ressource- og udliciteringsstyring samt sikkerhed og kvalitetsstyring mv. inden for informatikområdet for hele koncernen.

Læser du stadig med?
Og har du lyst til at vide endnu mere om dine karrieremuligheder ved Koncern IT, og hvordan du søger, kan du gøre det hér: www.karriere.forsvaret.dk/job/kaki.

Læs mere om Forsvaret som arbejdsplads på www.Forsvaret.dk

Description:
About the job:

Our Commercial Finance team is expanding and is looking for our next Commercial Analyst to work closely with internal stakeholders of the business, optimize our business processes and improve performance. So are you up for doing deep dive analysis’ of the commercial aspects in Saxo and do you enjoy working with passionate and competent team members in a dynamic environment? Then this opportunity is definitely for you!
In Commercial Finance we analyse and review Saxo’s revenue performance and report to relevant internal stakeholders. We help shape the commercial agenda in collaboration with our Global Sales department and Saxo Experience Office (SXO).
Our team consists of five analysts with one employee placed in the Netherlands and the rest of the team placed in our headquarter in Copenhagen. We encourage each other to always be curious and challenge the status quo when it comes to optimizing financial performance. Coming from different backgrounds and interests our work environment is filled with interesting discussions and inputs on new innovative ways of working. We value an environment build on trust, transparency and ownership. Our team share learnings and collaborate closely with each other to always ensure the best quality. As our new Commercial Analyst, you will be reporting directly to our Head of Commercial Analysis and BI.

Description:
Bystrategi i Aarhus Kommunes søger pr. 1. juni 2023 en engageret og ambitiøs kollega til enheden Projektsupport, der med kyndig hånd og i et åbent samarbejde med kolleger kan understøtte de processer og projekter, som er forankret i afdelingen.
Om jobbet
Udviklingen i Aarhus går stærkt. Kommunen vokser årligt med ca. 4.000 indbyggere, og det stiller store krav til udviklingen af nye byområder. I udviklingen af de store kommunale udviklingsområder er Bystrategi omdrejningspunkt for udviklingen af Aarhus Ø, Lisbjerg, Sydhavnskvarteret, Amtssygehuset og Godsbanearealerne, der alle har sit eget særlige DNA.
Projektsupport understøtter den ansvarlige projektleder for de kommunale byudviklingsområder og hjælper med enten at tage eget projektlederansvar for udvalgte delprojekter eller ved at fungere som assisterende projektleder.

Job_title: DevOps Engineer with a passion for Linux
Description:
We are building the next generation operations platform based on modern Linux technologies, and we need your help herding the penguins, and driving the gremlins away. It may get messy, and some files may get corrupted, but at the end of the journey enlightenment and wisdom awaits. If you take upon this quest, then we can offer you an exciting opportunity as part of the Research and Development DevOps team.

Our systems, ranging from rack servers to laptops and embedded systems, are built upon a solid Linux foundation, and we are looking for people with strong problem-solving skills, desire to learn, and not least knowledge of the Linux ecosystem.
As Operations Development Engineer you will work closely with software development, support, and field operations teams in designing new solutions and solving problems for existing customers both locally in our headquarters in Denmark and remotely across Europe, the USA, and Japan. You will have the opportunity to interact with various high-tech products and technologies such as Doppler radars, machine vision, and 3D graphics.

Job_title: Quantum Processor integration lead for semiconducting platform
Description:
Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computer Programme at Niels Bohr Institute, Faculty of Science, the University of Copenhagen is looking for a Quantum Processor integration lead with effect from 1 June, or earlier.

About us
The Novo Nordisk Foundation Quantum Computing Programme (NQCP) is establishing a talented and diverse international team to create a cutting-edge quantum programme in the heart of Copenhagen. We aim to establish an international quantum computing programme that will drive research and innovations at multiple levels - from developing scalable quantum processor technologies to solutions for the quantum-classical control and readout interface, and all the way to quantum algorithms and applications.

The long-term mission of the programme is to develop fault-tolerant quantum computing hardware and quantum algorithms that solve life-science-relevant chemical and biological problems.


We are seeking an experienced quantum engineer with expertise in semiconducting spin qubits and integrated circuits involving semiconducting components to the newly established programme, NQCP at the Niels Bohr Institute in Copenhagen, Denmark.

The employee will be focusing on designing, assembling, and advancing state-of-the-art experiments to develop semiconducting components for the generation and processing of quantum information.

The employee will lead the spin qubit and semiconductor platform development at the centre hub, and in close collaboration with superconducting and photonic qubit platform teams, work with chip fabrication, characterization, theory, and simulation teams. The employee will build an international network of collaborators with a main scope of responsibility centring on semiconductor system engineering, including running measurements, data tracking & analysis, and reporting.









Joining NQCP now, you will be involved from the very beginning and contribute to the fulfilment of the mission of NQCP. We want to make Denmark a world leader in quantum research, and we hope to attract people from all over the world.

Life in Denmark is supported with strong social services (free universal healthcare, free/subsidised language courses, paid parental leave, subsidised day care institutions and excellent public schools). Our work culture is very egalitarian and prioritises work life balance. Dual career families are the norm, and workplaces offer flexibility to support everyone in having both an exciting career and good family time. Danish cities are known for having excellent infrastructure, for example through widespread bike path networks. We can also offer a thriving food-scene, excellent museums, and beautiful natural scenery.


The employment and salary are made in accordance with the Circular on the Collective Agreement concerning academics in the state sector concluded between the Ministry of Finance and AC (the Danish Confederation of Professional Associations).

Employment will be as special consultant. The salary is based on seniority. Negotiation for salary supplement is possible. The working time are 37 hours per week on average. The working hours are flexible.
The employment period is limited until 31 December 2029.

Appointment will be subject to receipt of a security clearance.


If you find the job interesting, please send an electronic application with attachment via Jobportalen (click on the link "Apply Now" at the bottom of the post) no later than
Interviews will take place during April.

The University of Copenhagen seeks to reflect society and encourages applications irrespective of personal background.


Any questions about the position may be directed to Peter Krogstrup (krogstrup@nbi.ku.dk).

The Faculty of Science at the University of Copenhagen – or SCIENCE – is Denmark's largest science research and education institution with 4,000 employees and 9,700 Bachelor and Master students in 12 departments. The faculty has an annual budget of DKK 3 billion.

Learn more about The Faculty of Science at www.science.ku.dk .

Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Scientist/Associate Scientist to join our high-throughput screening team as we develop innovative CRISPR-Cas12a-based therapeutics for treating diseases. This position is ideal for a candidate with a passion for cutting-edge science and a desire to make a significant impact on Ensoma’s therapeutic products. As part of a small but growing team, you will have the opportunity to work alongside experienced researchers and develop your skills in molecular biology, biochemistry, and/or computational biology. You will also collaborate with colleagues from the cell biology and protein engineering teams to develop and validate therapeutic strategies for CRISPR-Cas12a-based therapeutics. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who has a strong scientific, educational background and hands on experience to continue to build upon this foundation in a role with high impact potential.
Responsibilities:
Design and execute high-throughput screening assays to identify novel CRISPR-Cas12a variants and optimize their performance for treating diseases.
