Description:
Vær med til noget stort! Sæt dit personlige præg på Danmarks infrastruktur.
Er du god til at skabe overblik, og vil du være med til at gøre en ekstraordinær forskel? Så har du muligheden nu, da vi søger to Asset Managers.
Som asset manager i Banedanmark er du med til at skabe overblik over tilstanden i Banedanmarks sikringstekniske anlæg og lægge den rigtige plan i forhold til reinvesteringer og øget vedligehold. Samtidig med, at vi udskifter systemer i vores mange projekter, har du og dine kolleger det helt afgørende ansvar for at sikre, at den daglige drift kører på skinner. Det er en spændende og vigtig opgave. Vil du være med?
Et væsentligt element i Banedanmarks strategi er målstyring, hvilket vi bruger til løbende at følge op på fremdrift og kvaliteten i vores leverancer, men også til at analysere og forandre de underliggende processer, således at vi hele tiden bliver bedre til det vi gør.

Job_title: Senior Cloud Data Engineer for FLSmidth – Copenhagen
Description:
Senior Cloud Data Engineer for FLSmidth – Copenhagen
Faste stillinger
Permanent Placement
Vigerslev Allé 77, 2500 Copenhagen
Discover sustainable solutions
Do you want to make a difference in the world and contribute to a sustainable future?

As a leader in the cement and mining industries, FLSmidth has taken the responsibility of developing sustainable solutions. They have an ambition to engineer the zero-emissions cement plant and the zero-emissions mining process by 2030. On this journey, they see digitalization as the enabler towards this mission. Therefore, we are looking for a Senior Cloud Data Engineer with a good know-how and innovative mindset that can help FLSmidth to take them from idea to action.

As a Cloud data engineer, you will team up with 10 colleagues in a global Data Engineering team. We are looking for a very experienced profile who will take a natural interest in helping and coaching team members and help them grow their skills, sharing your experience and feedback.

You will in close collaboration with your teammates be responsible for developing FLSmidth’s corporate data platform on Snowflake and enable easy access to both structured and unstructured data from multiple sources. You will be building data pipelines, data integration and ingestion as well as data preparation and modelling. You will be driving self-service initiatives and contribute to the continuous improvement of data services supporting FLSmidth globally and their customers.

The team is part of the Architecture, Data & Analytics department which is an integral part of FLSmidth’s Digital and Operational Excellence function. The team is working dedicated to enable that business information becomes easily available in a well-defined and sufficient quality. The team is committed to democratizing the data and building the data infrastructure to support FLSmidth with insight, and analysis for the decision-making processes and to leverage enhanced productivity and sustainability through BI and Advanced Analytics.

Euman is an IT company specialising in Wireless Information Services in the area of pervasive computing. Euman works with and in the virtual world. Our vision is to integrate the virtual world into the real physical world in order to enable the user of Euman's Wireless Information Services fullfil all needs for information independent of time and place.

Primarily, Euman's development department is working with technical and concept development for Wireless Information Services. Furthermore, Euman has specialised in the development of innovative IT solutions for large public and private businesses. This means that there are also external development projects in the company.

Euman embodies a young and energetic team, which professionally is among the best. At the moment, there is an equal representation of male and female employees with technical and humanistic university backgrounds. This means that you will be joining a team of skilled employees in a challenging environment where collaboration and multidisciplinary work is a natural part of the working day.

In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Job_title: ABB Sattline/800xA automation engineer - AFRY in Copenhagen
Description:
Who is AFRY?
AFRY is a European leader in engineering, design and advisory services with 19.000 devoted experts in infrastructure, industry, energy and digitalization. In Denmark we’re 650 colleagues who work with buildings, transportation, process industry, pharma industry, automation, energy, architecture, acoustics, and sound design as well as lighting design.
We are on a mission: to accelerate the transition towards a sustainable society, and our vision is Making Future. We take that seriously.
Time for something new? Then join AFRY. Right now, we’re looking for an ABB SattLine/800xA specialist who can and wants to help us raise the bar within Pharma and Life Science.

Description:
Are you passionate about improving the quality and sustainability of engines used in worldwide shipping? Do you want to be part of a young and dynamic team that values teamwork and collaboration? If so, we are looking for a Research Engineer in Test & Validation to join our team!
What will you be doing:
Every new engine type requires a prototype test to ensure that performance and emission requirements are meet. Adjustment of an engine is a balance between the structural stress and heat load of the internal components while maintaining the efficiency of the combustion process. Our department is responsible for measuring and reporting all the desired effects during the prototype test creating the basis for correction of the modelling/simulation and the decisions for final engine specification before it is ready to enter service.

Job_title: UI desktop w/cloud, C++ / C# Software Developer
Description:
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.
Task:
“Make pretty pictures out of huge amount of data” and “steady application configurations”.

We are looking for a new colleague to join our Plant Engineering team in Hillerød. Are you interested in design, commissioning, and maintenance of SCADA systems in a GMP environment? Then you might be just the candidate we are looking for!
About the position
Our new Automation Engineer will provide support to our new AVEVA SCADA system, including system administration and configuration of server, network, PLCs and interfaces. Create and review functional specification system configuration documentation. Document and manage changes to the Validated part of the system. Provide support for standalone PLC’s and Critical Alarm Management system, Software version control system (VersionDog) and interfaces to PI data storage system.
You will participate in investment projects that include expansion or modification to existing SCADA system. You will work closely with end-users to understand system functionalities to find optimal Automation solutions that support equipment reliability and digitalization strategies.

Description:
We are looking for a PI Historian Lead Automation Engineer, who shares our passion, drive, and positive energy – what we call Genki – to join our Automation team.

You will join an organization focusing on people, and a steep learning curve as well as a diverse workplace with people driven to make a difference. Equally importantly, someone who wants to be a part of the largest growth journey that we in FUJIFILM have ever entered.
As the PI Historian Lead Automation Engineer, you possess a detailed knowledge in the AVEVA (OSIsoft) PI System and with experience in the pharmaceutical business using the PI system in a GMP environment. Knowledge about DCS Systems (DeltaV) and reporting Systems (InfoBatch and Crystal reports) is an advantage but not a requirement.
About the team
Reporting to the Automation Manager, you will be part of a team of more than 30 Automation Engineers. Automation is a part of the FDB cross site Platform organization. The position is local to Hillerød, Denmark and requires site presence.

Job_title: Tech Leads til at sætte retning for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence-området i Skatteforvaltningen
Description:
Vil du være med til at udvikle den datadrevne Skatteforvaltning? Og kan du skabe sammenhæng mellem forretningsbehov, teknologier, kompetencer og metoder? Så har vi brug for dig!

Vi søger profiler med et stærkt IT-fagligt fundament, som kan drive udviklingen af Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence-området i Skatteforvaltningen.
Du vil i samarbejde med andre Leads, Enterprise- og løsningsarkitekter og generalister sætte den strategiske retning for udviklingen på DW/BI-området og styrke fagligheden på tværs af Skatteforvaltningen.

Center for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence udvikler og vedligeholder en stor portefølje af løsninger, og derudover har vi en ambition om at hjælpe hele Skatteforvaltningen til at bygge morgendagens fremtidssikrede dataløsninger selv. Hvis vi skal lykkes med det, kræver det de rette teknologivalg, gennemtænkte metoder og ikke mindst, at vi kompetenceudvikler kollegaer i Skatteforvaltningen.

Du skal være med til at løfte en bred vifte af opgaver med strategisk og operationelt sigte, vi er spændte på at høre, hvilken rolle du vil kunne spille hos os.





Som medarbejder hos os bliver du en del af et stort fagligt fællesskab i Center for Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence, der består af ca. 80 medarbejdere, både Data Engineers, BI-udviklere, Business Analysts, Product Owners, driftsansvarlige og generalister.
Vi prioriterer tid til sparring og til at dyrke vores faglighed. Vi afholder tre årlige centerdage og et seminar med både interne og eksterne oplæg, workshops og andre indslag, der skal styrke vores sociale sammenhold og faglighed. Derudover har vi flere fagfællesskaber, hvori de forskellige fagligheder kan vidensdele, erfaringsudveksle og løse opgaver, der sikrer udvikling og forbedring af vores område.

Når du starter, vil du få et struktureret og målrettet onboardingprogram, så du får bred erfaring inden for vores Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence-område og hurtig hands on-erfaring, så du hurtigt kan være med til at udvikle solide løsninger, der skaber værdi for hele Skatteforvaltningen.


Du er en erfaren Data Engineer, BI-udvikler, arkitekt, eller lignende og kendt som et fagligt fyrtårn indenfor en af områderne Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence, Enterprise eller løsningsarkitektur.
Du skal frem for alt tage ejerskab for de teknologiske og faglige muligheder, og være med til at skabe intern og ekstern entusiasme omkring dem. Du trives i at arbejde med komplekse emner og har en struktureret og transparent tilgang til dit arbejde. Dine gode samarbejdsevner samt evne til at forhandle og indgå kompromiser sætter du i spil på tværs af forskellige interessenter og fagligheder, og du har erfaring med at omsætte behov til stabile og varige løsninger.

Vi lægger derudover vægt på, at:


Koncernsproget er dansk, så vi forventer, at du kan forstå og formulere dig på dansk – både skriftligt og mundtligt.


Din leder i Data Warehouse og Business Intelligence stiller store krav til sig selv og sine medarbejdere, og har et højt ambitionsniveau på fagområdets vegne, men går ikke på kompromis med medarbejdernes trivsel. Fleksibilitet og en god work-life-balance er grundstenen i et bæredygtigt arbejdsliv. Du får en inkluderende leder, der går ind for åben og ærlig dialog. En leder, der giver ansvar, plads og medbestemmelse – fordi det skal være sjovt at gå på arbejde!


Send din ansøgning med CV, dokumentation for uddannelse samt eventuelt yderligere materiale via linket ”Søg stillingen” senest onsdag 19. april.

Vi indkalder løbende til samtaler.

Stillingen er med opstart den 1. juni eller hurtigst muligt efter aftale.

Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte kontorchef Astrid Iversen på tlf. 72 37 06 18.

Vi forventer at benytte en personlighedsanalyse og en logisk test i rekrutteringsprocessen.

Der vil forud for ansættelsen blive indhentet straffeattest.

Du bliver ansat på overenskomstvilkår i henhold til gældende overenskomst for akademikere i staten (AC), overenskomst for kontorfunktionærer, laboranter og IT-medarbejdere (HK) eller overenskomst for fuldmægtige m.fl. (DTS) i Skatteministeriet.

Ansættelsesområdet er Skatteministeriet med tilhørende institutioner. Arbejdsstedet er Osvald Helmuths Vej 4, 2000 Frederiksberg.

Job_title: Lead APP udvikler til Android – gør en forskel for Politiets arbejde i felten
Description:
Hvidovre
Politiet er i gang med den nok mest spændende it-udvikling nogensinde. Brænder du for udvikling af apps og har du lyst til at gøre en forskel for, at politimanden på gaden kan udføre sit arbejde så effektivt som muligt? Så er dette muligvis jobbet for dig.

Om jobbet
Som Lead Androidudvikler har du ansvar for kvaliteten af den udviklede kode. Du kommer du til at arbejde i et SCRUM team, som i tæt samarbejde med forretningsanalytikere, testere og brugere, udvikler mobile løsninger, der kan effektivisere politiets opgavevaretagelse i felten.

Dansk politi har organiseret et app-domæne, der udvikler nye og videreudvikler eksisterende operative apps. Din hverdag består af at udvikle de operative apps, der understøtter betjentenes arbejde på gerningssteder og i kontakten med borgerne, og dit arbejde er derfor helt essentielle for, at betjentene kan udføre deres arbejde. Udviklingen af apps sker desuden i tæt samarbejde med slutbrugerne, så du vil have rig mulighed for at samarbejde med Politiets uniformerede betjente og komme tæt på kerneforretningen. Eksempler på apps du bidrager til at udvikle og vedligeholde er:


Derudover får du i stillingen mulighed for at præge Politiets arbejde gennem disse mulige fremtidige opgaver:


Sektion for Softwareudvikling består i dag af ca. 20 dedikerede softwareudviklere, som leverer værdiskabende apps og tilhørende integrationer til politiet. Din dagligdag præges af teamarbejde, hvor du i tæt samarbejde med forskellige faggrupper, eksterne leverandører og de politifaglige slutbrugere, anvender dine udviklerkompetencer til at finde de bedste løsninger til gavn for slutbrugerne. Som sektion vægter vi samarbejde, faglige udfordringer, vidensdeling og professionalisme højt. Vi har en åben samarbejdskultur og flad struktur, hvor alle bidrager til at skabe og bevare et godt arbejdsmiljø. Vi sikrer opretholdelsen af et højt fagligt niveau ved at prioritere faglig udvikling og uddannelse.


Vi forestiller os, at du har en relevant it eller teknisk uddannelsesmæssig baggrund, eksempelvis datalog, cand.it, it-ingeniør eller lignende. Alternativt har du gennem praktisk erfaring inden for området opbygget skarpe kompetencer inden for mobil app-udvikling. Du er senior udvikler med stor erfaring indenfor udvikling af APPs og har tidligere indgået i tværfunktionelle udviklingsteams. I rollen her, er der rig mulighed for at udvikle dine kompetencer inden for avanceret mobilløsninger, ny teknologi og agile udviklingsmetoder.

Vi lægger overordnet vægt på, at du har god erfaring inden for flere af nedenstående områder:


Du brænder for at levere gode løsninger, der understøtter forretningens behov og har blik for planlægning, struktur og dokumentation. Du udviser initiativ, handlekraft og selvstændighed samt trives med at arbejde med mange opgaver på samme tid.

Som person har du en nysgerrig og videbegærlig tilgang til tingene og sætter pris på at lære nye metoder og blive udfordret på det, du kender. Du kan lide at arbejde med agile udviklingsmetoder og går til arbejdsopgaverne på analytisk og metodisk vis. Du er en uformel teamplayer, som trives med en stor berøringsflade med mange interessenter som en naturlig del af din hverdag, hvor du evner at formidle tekniske budskaber på en klar og forståelig måde.

Af hensyn til samarbejde med bl.a. leverandører er det en forudsætning, at du taler og skriver fejlfrit på dansk, ligesom vi forventer, at du er velbevandret i teknisk engelsk.

Job_title: Erfarne ServiceNow konsulenter til Devoteam Technology Consulting
Description:
Jobbeskrivelse

Vil du arbejde med branchens dygtigste konsulenter og gøre en forskel hos nogle af Danmarks største virksomheder?
Vi søger tekniske ServiceNow konsulenter til vores kontor i Århus, som drømmer om at gøre en forskel hos nogle af Danmarks største virksomheder med Danmarks mest erfarne konsulenter ved sin side. Uanset om du er i starten af din karriere eller erfaren seniorkonsulent, hører vi meget gerne fra dig.
Danmarks største Service Management-hus
Hos Devoteam Technology Consulting arbejder vi med Service Management og IT Cost Optimization hos nogle af Danmarks største og mest komplekse virksomheder. Vi sælger, implementerer og supporterer løsninger baseret på ServiceNow, Atlassian JIRA, Micro Focus og . Vi har implementeret løsninger hos virksomheder som Nets, Arla, Topdanmark, Ørsted, DSB, COOP, Københavns Kommune og Region Hovedstaden.

Vil du være en del af et IT-konsulenthus som går op i kvalitet, og vil du være en vital part i at sikre en løbende og automatiseret test af udviklingen af forretningskritiske it-systemer? Så er vi på udkig efter det dig.

Som Teknisk Tester i Nine vil du blive en del af et agilt udviklingsteam. I tæt samarbejde med udviklerne og forretningen arbejder du med automatiserede test, for at sikre høj kvalitet på forretningskritiske IT-løsninger.
Som person er du løsningsorienteret og proaktiv, og sammen med resten af udviklingsteamet stræber du efter at opnå høj kvalitet i leverancerne. Du er resultatorienteret, har sans for detaljer og går struktureret til værks. Arbejdsopgaverne vil give dig rig mulighed for at komme med nye idéer og smarte løsninger– og at følge disse til dørs.

ONNEC Group are a leading independent technology partner and global integrator, with over 30 years experience, and a 800+ team of global experts, specialising in providing end-to-end connectivity solutions that propel organisations everywhere.
We are a rapidly growing organisation and finding and retaining the highest calibre of people is fundamental to us for the success of our business, we work hard to create a challenging, supportive and satisfying working environment for all our employees. ONNEC has successfully achieved the Investors in Diversity Foundational Award for our commitment to equality, diversity and inclusion in the workplace.
Onnec Group is a leading multinational group of companies with our headquarter in London. We are active in the field of infrastructure for Telecommunications, Data Centres & smart buildings. In addition, we are providing distinguished IT managed services & smart hands to our clients. We have dozens of ongoing projects around the globe. We are looking to prequalify MAC Engineer to work with us as an independent subcontractor in our projects.

Description:
It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.
Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.
We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.

Description:
Software Engineer - Automation
Maersk is achieving an unprecedented transformation in the growth of our business, rethinking the way we engage with customers and partners, and how the world’s trade flows across our global network. From the farm to your refrigerator, or the factory to your wardrobe, we are developing solutions in-house that meet customer needs across the whole Supply Chain E2E. Joining Maersk you will join a global leader in Container Logistics as we embark on an industry-defining digital transformation that will revolutionize trade.
You’ll play a vital part in our success, helping us re-think what technology can do by using the latest technologies, and building the experience to advance your career. If you are passionate about working in an entrepreneurial environment supporting an ambitious, culturally diverse team of 3000 People within Maersk Technology – on a great transformation journey – then apply today!

The role of the Software Engineer

Description:
Som Data Engineer bliver du en del af Verdos udviklingsteam i IT-afdelingen. Du vil sammen med dit team og øvrige stakeholders designe og bygge/konfigurere Verdos kommende nye dataplatform fra bunden.
Vi har udfordringerne, du har viden og vilje
Vi forestiller os, at du har en solid forståelse for data, herunder erfaring med MS SQL, god forståelse for løsningsarkitektur og solidt kendskab til data modellering. Du kommer formentlig fra et hybrid set up, hvor du også har gjort dig indgående erfaringer med Azure , herunder eks. Data Factory og Databricks.
De primære opgaver
Arbejdsopgaverne omfatter blandt andet:

Vi søger en Compliance Engineer, der skal være med til sikre de absolut højeste kvalitetsstandarder for PR electronics produkter og processer.
Du får således stor mulighed for at bidrage positivt til virksomhedens processer og særligt indflydelse på de beslutninger, der omhandler produktgodkendelser inden for R&D og andre relevante afdelinger, der vedrører compliance og certificeringer.

Du bliver en vigtig brik i en tværfaglig arbejdsgruppe på 6 personer, der bl.a. arbejder med produktvedligehold, godkendelser og certificeringer.
Til jobbet knytter sig en række primære opgaver og jobmål:
Du bliver ansvarlig for processen omkring certificering af produkter herunder den direkte kommunikation med relevante myndigheder.
Du skal samarbejde med systemarkitekter gennem aktiviteter ved produktudviklingen, der sikrer at hardware/firmware konstruktioner er forenelige med godkendelser, der er specificeret i forhold til det enkelte produkts specifikationer

Description:
Vi søger en ny kollega, der har talent for Microsoft-teknologier og ikke er bange for at kaste sig ud i nye tekniske udfordringer.
Om stillingen
team.blue Denmark er en af landets største tech-virksomheder, der sælger hosting-løsninger til mere end 250.000 kunder. Vi er den danske del af gruppen team.blue, som er en europæisk tech-gigant med 28 kontorer og ca. 2000 medarbejdere rundt omkring i Europa.
Dit primære fokus bliver Windows-serveradministration, og du kommer til at arbejde med de nyeste teknologier indenfor Microsoft og automatisering. Din primære opgave bliver, sammen med vores dygtige teknikere, at vedligeholde vores Windows-serverfarm bestående af +4.500 Windows-servere og de services vi leverer til vores kunder. Du kommer også til at sidde med den daglige drift og kundehenvendelser. Det er derfor vigtigt, at du ikke er bange for at tage telefonen og ringe direkte til kunden hvis nødvendigt - vi sørger selvfølgelig for, at du får den fornødne viden gennem oplæring og buddyordning.

Description:
Kolding, Denmark
Are you motivated by advanced industrial automation? Can you write PLC code and ensure the plants run smoothly for our customers? Do you want to work with the standardization of complex machine controls for industrial ice cream making?

Gram Equipment is seeking an experienced Automation Engineer to join our Software Team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software systems for our ice cream production equipment.
You will be connected to the project with your team and be responsible for driving the development by programming advanced machines based on ' PLC, HMI, and Motion/Servo software. You start from the standard software library and tailor the solutions, so they match the customers’ needs and wishes. You will also work within the development of the software solutions, where you will have a broad contact surface within the Hardware team and the engineering department.

Job_title: Vil du arbejde med miljø og virksomheder?
Description:
Vil du være med til at føre tilsyn, arbejde med tilladelser og understøtte virksomhedernes fokus på klima og miljø via solidt myndighedsarbejde?
Vi vil ikke bare understøtte virksomhederne til at overholde lovgivningen, men også gerne til mere grøn omstilling så de både får øje på energioptimering cirkulær økonom og grøn transport. Hvidovre Kommune og virksomhederne på Avedøre Holme har et ambitiøst samarbejde, hvor vi har tæt og engageret dialog med mange virksomheder der gerne vil reducere deres miljø- og klimaaftryk.
Vi forventer, at du trives i myndighedsrollen og du kan sikre en god dialog med virksomhederne, så vi sammen kan sikre et godt miljø. Du får energi af at levere høj kvalitet i myndighedsbehandlingen, og bidrager til samarbejde på tværs af faggrupper, sikrer god service og holdbare løsninger for virksomheder og borgere.

Vil du kombinere din interesse for bygværker og vejafvanding, være med til at få styr på vores datasæt indenfor infrastrukturområdet og være med i front i forhold til nye systemer (dTims fra Vejdirektoratet), som pt. er under udvikling til anlæg både i og over jorden? Så er denne stilling måske noget for dig?
Vi søger en erfaren anlægsingeniør, gerne med projektledererfaring og lyst til at arbejde med projektledelse, driftsopgaver og med grundlæggende vejforvaltningsdata inden for kommunens infrastruktur.
Vi tilbyder en alsidig stilling, hvor du skal navigere imellem flere opgavetyper og samarbejdskonstellationer. Du har mulighed for paradigmeskift mellem de noget forskellige opgaver samtidig med, at du løser spændende opgaver, og så kan vi byde dig velkommen i en organisation, hvor fleksibilitet og et arbejdsliv i balance bliver prioriteret.

Job_title: Administrativ assistent til HSE-området i NNE
Description:
Bliv en del af passionen hos NNE
Vi er eksperter i hele processen, når du skal bygge farmaceutiske fabrikker og anlæg. Vores succes bygger på relationer, både med vores kolleger og vores kunder. Hvis du vil arbejde med projekter, der er med til at forme fremtidens bæredygtige og intelligente farmaceutiske faciliteter, så er NNE den helt rigtige arbejdsplads for dig.
Kom og arbejd med os
Nyder du at holde styr på tingene, få dem systematiseret, og er du teknisk interesseret?

NNE søger efter en struktureret, proaktiv og engageret administrativ assistent til at supportere vores dygtige Safety- og brandingeniører i deres daglige arbejde

NNE’s HSE-afdeling består af ca. 30 engagerede specialister, der hjælper vores kunder med at nå deres mål inden for miljø, arbejdsmiljø og sikkerhed - både når kunderne bygger nye fabrikker, når de bygger om og renoverer. Vi kan derfor tilbyde et udviklende miljø, hvor innovation og videndeling er højt prioriteret.

Du vil blive en del af et engageret team, hvor du vil arbejde tæt sammen med vores HSE kolleger i afdelingen.

Vores hovedkvarter er i Virum med et åbent og professionelt kontormiljø, hvilket giver plads og muligheder for videndeling, dialog, og selvfølgelig - sjov. Der vil også være mulighed for ansættelse på vores kontor i Kalundborg.

Description:
Kverneland Group er en førende international virksomhed, der udvikler, producerer og distribuerer landbrugsmaskiner og digitale tjenester. I Kverneland Group er der 3 vigtige principper I dagens landbrug. Produktivitet, effektivitet og bæredygtighed. Det motivere os til, at vi løbende udvikler vores teknologier. Kverneland Group er en førende international virksomhed, der udvikler, producere og distribuerer landbrugsmaskiner og tjenester. Stærkt fokus på innovation gør det muligt at lave et unikt og bredt produktsortiment af høj kvalitet. Kverneland Group tilbyder et bredt produktprogram rettet mod det professionelle landbrug. Programmet dækker områderne jordbearbejdning, såning, foder- og balle udstyr, spredning, sprøjtning, samt elektroniske løsninger til traktorer og redskaber, udbudt som hhv. Kverneland, Kubota og Vicon. Kverneland Group blev grundlagt i 1879 og råder over fabrikker i Norge, Danmark, Tyskland, Frankrig, Holland, Italien, Rusland og Kina, samt salgsselskaber i 17 lande og med eksport til yderligere 60 lande.

Kverneland Group er en del af Kubota Corporation, hvis primære ambition er at fremme og udvikle et bæredygtigt samfund via løsninger inden for fødevarer, vandforsyning og miljø. Kubota har, siden 1890, været en ledende producent af landbrugsredskaber, turf maskiner, entreprenørmaskiner samt en bred vifte af andre produkter blandt andet vandfiltrerings- og rørsystemer, vandingsanlæg og store underjordiske ventilsystemer. Med hovedkontor i Osaka i Japan, har Kubota globalt 50.352 ansatte fordelt på afdelinger i mere 120 lande i Nordamerika, Europa og Asien. I 2022 opnåede Kubota et resultat på $20.4 mia.

Job_title: UI software developer – leading subsea technology
Description:
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a UI desktop developer / C++ / C# Software Engineer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Description:
If you have excellent programming skills and a passion for developing applications, improving existing ones, and want to work in a dynamic, collaborative and international scale-up environment - we would like to meet you

We are looking for
.NET Software Engineers with 3+ years of experience in SaaS, microservices, message-driven architectures, Azure cloud, and high load systems to join our rapidly growing scale-up with offices in Copenhagen, Kraków, and Budapest. You will be joining our office in Copenhagen

About the role
We are looking for creative and driven developers. You will be part of building the ultimate omnichannel advertisement platform for large enterprises. Also, together we’ll be expanding our cloud-based infrastructure.

Open
The position
Job overall purpose
To improve automated test coverage and continuously collaborate and communicate with your team members in order to ensure high built-in quality on the team’s deliverables
Key areas of responsibility and key tasks
You will design and implement automated tests on both mobile and web applications as well as for the API’s.
Evaluating and selecting the right automation testing tools and infrastructure

We are looking for an experienced Python developer for scientific workflows and applications in our team at the Data Management and Software Centre (DMSC) in Copenhagen, Denmark!
Come join us and develop software solutions for one of the largest research infrastructures being built today, the European Spallation Source (ESS).
ESS is a “Big Science” project that aims to be the most powerful neutron microscope when fully operational in 2027. ESS will enable researchers to study the smallest objects in the finest detail.
We develop open source libraries and tools for staff and visiting scientists who will run neutron-scattering experiments at ESS.

Description:
We are looking for a new colleague to join our Plant Engineering team in Hillerød. Are you interested in design, commissioning, and maintenance of SCADA systems in a GMP environment? Then you might be just the candidate we are looking for!
About the position
Our new Automation Engineer will provide support to our new AVEVA SCADA system, including system administration and configuration of server, network, PLCs and interfaces. Create and review functional specification system configuration documentation. Document and manage changes to the Validated part of the system. Provide support for standalone PLC’s and Critical Alarm Management system, Software version control system (VersionDog) and interfaces to PI data storage system.
You will participate in investment projects that include expansion or modification to existing SCADA system. You will work closely with end-users to understand system functionalities to find optimal Automation solutions that support equipment reliability and digitalization strategies.

Job_title: Erfarne ServiceNow konsulenter til Devoteam Technology Consulting
Description:
Jobbeskrivelse

Vil du arbejde med branchens dygtigste konsulenter og gøre en forskel hos nogle af Danmarks største virksomheder?
Vi søger tekniske ServiceNow konsulenter til vores kontor i Århus, som drømmer om at gøre en forskel hos nogle af Danmarks største virksomheder med Danmarks mest erfarne konsulenter ved sin side. Uanset om du er i starten af din karriere eller erfaren seniorkonsulent, hører vi meget gerne fra dig.
Danmarks største Service Management-hus
Hos Devoteam Technology Consulting arbejder vi med Service Management og IT Cost Optimization hos nogle af Danmarks største og mest komplekse virksomheder. Vi sælger, implementerer og supporterer løsninger baseret på ServiceNow, Atlassian JIRA, Micro Focus og . Vi har implementeret løsninger hos virksomheder som Nets, Arla, Topdanmark, Ørsted, DSB, COOP, Københavns Kommune og Region Hovedstaden.

It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.
Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.
We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Description:
Kverneland Group er en førende international virksomhed, der udvikler, producerer og distribuerer landbrugsmaskiner og digitale tjenester. I Kverneland Group er der 3 vigtige principper I dagens landbrug. Produktivitet, effektivitet og bæredygtighed. Det motivere os til, at vi løbende udvikler vores teknologier. Kverneland Group er en førende international virksomhed, der udvikler, producere og distribuerer landbrugsmaskiner og tjenester. Stærkt fokus på innovation gør det muligt at lave et unikt og bredt produktsortiment af høj kvalitet. Kverneland Group tilbyder et bredt produktprogram rettet mod det professionelle landbrug. Programmet dækker områderne jordbearbejdning, såning, foder- og balle udstyr, spredning, sprøjtning, samt elektroniske løsninger til traktorer og redskaber, udbudt som hhv. Kverneland, Kubota og Vicon. Kverneland Group blev grundlagt i 1879 og råder over fabrikker i Norge, Danmark, Tyskland, Frankrig, Holland, Italien, Rusland og Kina, samt salgsselskaber i 17 lande og med eksport til yderligere 60 lande.

Kverneland Group er en del af Kubota Corporation, hvis primære ambition er at fremme og udvikle et bæredygtigt samfund via løsninger inden for fødevarer, vandforsyning og miljø. Kubota har, siden 1890, været en ledende producent af landbrugsredskaber, turf maskiner, entreprenørmaskiner samt en bred vifte af andre produkter blandt andet vandfiltrerings- og rørsystemer, vandingsanlæg og store underjordiske ventilsystemer. Med hovedkontor i Osaka i Japan, har Kubota globalt 50.352 ansatte fordelt på afdelinger i mere 120 lande i Nordamerika, Europa og Asien. I 2022 opnåede Kubota et resultat på $20.4 mia.

Job_title: UI/UX Intern at Valtech Aarhus - Fall 2023
Description:
Do you have to do an internship throughout your studies, and is it planned for fall 2023? And do you want a fast-paced internship where you get to work with some of the biggest brands in an international context? Then look no further.
Learn how to make great mistakes; come be our intern at Valtech's offices in Aarhus!

THE OPPORTUNITY
At Valtech, we are looking for awesome, curious, fearless, friendly interns for the UX and Design team. You will get to work with all aspects of your field of expertise, from workshops to pixel-perfecting, and you will never work alone.
At Valtech, we focus on matching the right people with the right task. That way, we do our best work, AND we have fun while doing it. And don’t worry if you are not quite sure what your “best work” is. We will help you figure this out.

Meta is seeking a forward-thinking experienced Engineer to join the Production Operations Engineering team within Infra Data Centers. Our data centers, and the hundreds of thousands of servers installed in them, are the foundation upon which our rapidly scaling infrastructure efficiently operates and upon which our innovative services are delivered. Meta is at the leading edge of the global data center industry both in terms of how data centers are designed and operated. This person should enjoy working in a fast paced, technical environment where adaptability and flexibility will be key to their success. We seek an IT professional with advanced, hands-on technical skills in server hardware and Linux (ideally in a Data Center environment). Having extensive knowledge of server administration and performing on complex projects in a large-scale distributed data center environment is a core competency of this individual. The candidate should also have deep knowledge and experience in at least one of the following core areas: Hardware, OS repair, Tooling and Automation and Project Management.

Description:
Your work days are brighter here.
At Workday, it all began with a conversation over breakfast. When our founders met at a sunny California diner, they came up with an idea to revolutionize the enterprise software market. And when we began to rise, one thing that really set us apart was our culture. A culture which was driven by our value of putting our people first. And ever since, the happiness, development, and contribution of every Workmate is central to who we are. Our Workmates believe a healthy employee-centric, collaborative culture is the essential mix of ingredients for success in business. That’s why we look after our people, communities and the planet while still being profitable. Feel encouraged to shine, however that manifests: you don’t need to hide who you are. You can feel the energy and the passion, it's what makes us unique. Inspired to make a brighter work day for all and transform with us to the next stage of our growth journey? Bring your brightest version of you and have a brighter work day here.
About the Team
As we grow the Peakon engineering team at Workday, we are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Engineer to join us in Copenhagen. Peakon teams own their roadmap, work collaboratively and include engineering, UI/UX design, and product management.

The Peakon team at Workday is driven by the belief that we can radically change the world of work. We believe that when an organisation listens to employee feedback and empowers every employee to drive the change they want to see, it can create more fulfilling jobs and grow in ways never before imagined.

We’re in the business of creating great places to work, so it should be no surprise that being a great place to work is our highest priority. With ambitions as big as ours, we see individual growth and development as the key strategy for growing our business.

The role is on the Language team which is dedicated to ensure we create actionable insights utilising Natural Language Processing on our very large comment dataset. We build features that allow users to understand and action employee Engagement issues. With multiple data scientists on the team you’ll get a chance to implement cutting edge machine learning and data science technologies into the product.

Job_title: Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager
Description:
Would you like to be part of a team driven by providing best quality results to support the planning, design and realisation of complex nearshore and offshore wind energy related projects? As an internationally operating consulting and R&D company, we offer a specialised and highly dynamic and flexible working environment in a team of world leading metocean and hydrodynamic specialists assisting mainly the offshore wind but also other marine infrastructure markets.
Endorsed by our success and the market growth, we are looking for an enthusiastic, structured, and ambitious Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager to be part of DHI’s Offshore Wind Global Business Unit within Metocean. We have local teams in both our headquarter in Hørsholm, Denmark, and in our United Kingdom office in Southampton.
As a Senior Metocean Engineer and Project Manager, you'll be undertaking (and/or managing) advanced modelling, analysis and reporting of meteorological, oceanographic and climatology processes to support the design and operation of marine activities and projects worldwide, in particular the offshore wind industry. You will be exposed to both advisory and development/research projects. In addition, you will be responsible of managing projects, mentoring, and training staff globally. As a project manager, it is essential that you have technical in-depth experience with metocean modelling and analyses and having experience in offshore wind would be considered as a bonus.

Description:
Pick a point on a globe, and Maersk won’t be far away. With 90% of global trade carried by sea, there is a high chance that the shoes on your feet or the phone in your pocket travelled to you on a Maersk vessel. Would you like to impact the daily lives of people in every corner of the world? Then keep reading.
What We Do
Come join us to help utilize technology to tackle the world’s CO2 challenge!

You’ve probably heard of or have even worked with IoT devices before. But have you ever heard of IoT devices that are close to half a kilometer long, weigh in at 300,000 metric tonnes and float around in the middle of the Pacific Ocean? Well, we are lucky enough to work with these floating mega devices! We are even more fortunate to be tackling one of the most pressing issues in the world today….global warming.
But how do you mix large IoT devices with global warming?

Glad you asked! Shipping contributes to 3% of global CO2 emissions, and Maersk, as the world’s leading shipping company, has a large responsibility to tackle this issue and drive the industry towards solutions. Each decision starts with data and knowing our vessels’ data (intimately ) is part of our mission.

As a member of the tech teams in StarConnect (as we call ourselves) you will contribute to tackling the carbon pollution issue by using technology. And help us monitor our fleet’s fuel and empower our seafarers to reduce our carbon emissions.

We’re progressing well on a journey to bring our 700 container vessels online by hooking up to countless sensors onboard. But this has proven to be quite the challenge! Hardware installations & upgrades, deploying our apps and dealing with limited connectivity on remote platforms are some of the daily challenges we face in Maersk Decarb. But nothing comes easy when you’re working with such grand ambitions!
We are looking for a Senior Frontend Software Engineer for our Technical Efficiency & Data Collection team.

The team is building products deployed to the full fleet of Maersk vessels sailing around the globe. The aim of the products is to collect, automate & validate performance data from the vessels. This data is then modelled and turned into user insights & advice for energy decisions on-board and in office.

The end goal of our products is to drive fuel savings & reduce emission, to support Maersk's ambitious carbon neutral targets.

Our team is diverse! We are representing 7 nationalities and a variety of professions and specialialities - all working towards a common goal of supporting our users to reduce fuel & helping make their life easier on-board!

We're looking for an open minded, skilled, and passionate team member to help us on our product journey.

Job_title: Løsningsarkitekt til samfundskritiske og komplekse systemområder indenfor staten
Description:
Er du en teknisk stærk løsningsarkitekt, som både kan se sagen fra helikopterperspektivet og gå ned i detaljen? Vil du være en del af Danmarks største offentlige it-virksomhed med højt til loftet og fokus på den enkelte medarbejders udvikling? Og er du god til at tænke langsigtet og brænder for at levere digitale løsninger, der skaber værdi for danske skatteydere? Så er det dig, vi har brug for!
Om jobbet
Du bliver ansat i afdelingen EEE Systemer og Udvikling 4, hvis formål er at understøtte eIndkomst og eKapital området, som er samfundskritiske og komplekse systemområder i staten.
Som løsningsarkitekt arbejder du med it-arkitektur i bred forstand og har en afgørende rolle med at samle og opbygge viden omkring det nuværende og fremtidige systemlandskab. Du kommer til at arbejde med en portefølje af projekter, hvor du indgår og understøtter fullstack teams, der udvikler nye it-løsninger og har den efterfølgende drift. Fokusområdet er 3. partsindberetninger og udstilling af samme, så vi sikrer et korrekt skatteprovenu ift borgere og virksomheder.

Description:
Would you like to help us revolutionise the development and manufacturing of electronic, photonics, and optics industries? Welcome to ATLANT 3D – we invite you for an amazing journey where you will be a part of a team working towards disrupting 60 years of micro and nanofabrication technologies and systems. We offer you a once-in-a-lifetime experience. What we develop is unique, and we are incredibly excited to make a difference.
We are looking for a Machine Software Developer Engineer to build and deliver machine software control solutions for ATLANT 3D’s line of products ranging from implementing the software system architecture inclusive of real time controls, and data management. The software architecture should meet customer security and IP protection, interface to manufacturing factory standards as used in semiconductor manufacturing, and implementation of of-the-shelve solutions.

Job_title: UI software developer – leading subsea technology
Description:
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a UI desktop developer / C++ / C# Software Engineer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Job_title: Senior Embedded Software Developer – leading subsea technology
Description:
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a Senior Embedded Software Developer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Software Engineer - Automation
Maersk is achieving an unprecedented transformation in the growth of our business, rethinking the way we engage with customers and partners, and how the world’s trade flows across our global network. From the farm to your refrigerator, or the factory to your wardrobe, we are developing solutions in-house that meet customer needs across the whole Supply Chain E2E. Joining Maersk you will join a global leader in Container Logistics as we embark on an industry-defining digital transformation that will revolutionize trade.
You’ll play a vital part in our success, helping us re-think what technology can do by using the latest technologies, and building the experience to advance your career. If you are passionate about working in an entrepreneurial environment supporting an ambitious, culturally diverse team of 3000 People within Maersk Technology – on a great transformation journey – then apply today!

In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. Job_title: UI/UX Intern at Valtech Aarhus - Fall 2023
Description:
Do you have to do an internship throughout your studies, and is it planned for fall 2023? And do you want a fast-paced internship where you get to work with some of the biggest brands in an international context? Then look no further.
Learn how to make great mistakes; come be our intern at Valtech's offices in Aarhus!

THE OPPORTUNITY
At Valtech, we are looking for awesome, curious, fearless, friendly interns for the UX and Design team. You will get to work with all aspects of your field of expertise, from workshops to pixel-perfecting, and you will never work alone.
At Valtech, we focus on matching the right people with the right task. That way, we do our best work, AND we have fun while doing it. And don’t worry if you are not quite sure what your “best work” is. We will help you figure this out.

We are looking for an experienced Python developer for scientific workflows and applications in our team at the Data Management and Software Centre (DMSC) in Copenhagen, Denmark!
Come join us and develop software solutions for one of the largest research infrastructures being built today, the European Spallation Source (ESS).
ESS is a “Big Science” project that aims to be the most powerful neutron microscope when fully operational in 2027. ESS will enable researchers to study the smallest objects in the finest detail.
We develop open source libraries and tools for staff and visiting scientists who will run neutron-scattering experiments at ESS.

You will participate in investment projects that include expansion or modification to existing SCADA system. You will work closely with end-users to understand system functionalities to find optimal Automation solutions that support equipment reliability and digitalization strategies.

Description:
Pick a point on a globe, and Maersk won’t be far away. With 90% of global trade carried by sea, there is a high chance that the shoes on your feet or the phone in your pocket travelled to you on a Maersk vessel. Would you like to impact the daily lives of people in every corner of the world? Then keep reading.
What We Do
Come join us to help utilize technology to tackle the world’s CO2 challenge!

You’ve probably heard of or have even worked with IoT devices before. But have you ever heard of IoT devices that are close to half a kilometer long, weigh in at 300,000 metric tonnes and float around in the middle of the Pacific Ocean? Well, we are lucky enough to work with these floating mega devices! We are even more fortunate to be tackling one of the most pressing issues in the world today….global warming.
But how do you mix large IoT devices with global warming?

Glad you asked! Shipping contributes to 3% of global CO2 emissions, and Maersk, as the world’s leading shipping company, has a large responsibility to tackle this issue and drive the industry towards solutions. Each decision starts with data and knowing our vessels’ data (intimately ) is part of our mission.

As a member of the tech teams in StarConnect (as we call ourselves) you will contribute to tackling the carbon pollution issue by using technology. And help us monitor our fleet’s fuel and empower our seafarers to reduce our carbon emissions.

We’re progressing well on a journey to bring our 700 container vessels online by hooking up to countless sensors onboard. But this has proven to be quite the challenge! Hardware installations & upgrades, deploying our apps and dealing with limited connectivity on remote platforms are some of the daily challenges we face in Maersk Decarb. But nothing comes easy when you’re working with such grand ambitions!
We are looking for a Senior Frontend Software Engineer for our Technical Efficiency & Data Collection team.

The team is building products deployed to the full fleet of Maersk vessels sailing around the globe. The aim of the products is to collect, automate & validate performance data from the vessels. This data is then modelled and turned into user insights & advice for energy decisions on-board and in office.

The end goal of our products is to drive fuel savings & reduce emission, to support Maersk's ambitious carbon neutral targets.

Our team is diverse! We are representing 7 nationalities and a variety of professions and specialialities - all working towards a common goal of supporting our users to reduce fuel & helping make their life easier on-board!

We're looking for an open minded, skilled, and passionate team member to help us on our product journey.

Description: Meta is seeking a forward-thinking experienced Engineer to join the Production Operations Engineering team within Infra Data Centers. Our data centers, and the hundreds of thousands of servers installed in them, are the foundation upon which our rapidly scaling infrastructure efficiently operates and upon which our innovative services are delivered. Meta is at the leading edge of the global data center industry both in terms of how data centers are designed and operated. This person should enjoy working in a fast paced, technical environment where adaptability and flexibility will be key to their success. We seek an IT professional with advanced, hands-on technical skills in server hardware and Linux (ideally in a Data Center environment). Having extensive knowledge of server administration and performing on complex projects in a large-scale distributed data center environment is a core competency of this individual. The candidate should also have deep knowledge and experience in at least one of the following core areas: Hardware, OS repair, Tooling and Automation and Project Management.

Description:
Would you like to help us revolutionise the development and manufacturing of electronic, photonics, and optics industries? Welcome to ATLANT 3D – we invite you for an amazing journey where you will be a part of a team working towards disrupting 60 years of micro and nanofabrication technologies and systems. We offer you a once-in-a-lifetime experience. What we develop is unique, and we are incredibly excited to make a difference.
We are looking for a Machine Software Developer Engineer to build and deliver machine software control solutions for ATLANT 3D’s line of products ranging from implementing the software system architecture inclusive of real time controls, and data management. The software architecture should meet customer security and IP protection, interface to manufacturing factory standards as used in semiconductor manufacturing, and implementation of of-the-shelve solutions.

Let’s reimagine how the world moves.
As an international business on a high-tech journey, we don’t just transport millions of tons of cargo. We’re leading a digital revolution in global trade, creating opportunities for millions of customers around the world through new technology, data science, and artificial intelligence.
Growing your skills with Maersk means growing global trade and reinventing our industry, creating a digital foundation that moves the world. But it also means creating life-enhancing prosperity for people and communities through exciting initiatives.
Where will your technology career move next?
We are hiring for a SAP Automation Engineer with a strong knowledge and configuration experience on core SAP Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) processes and tools. You will use your multiple lifecycle implementation experience using various ALM tools - SAP Solution Manager, SAP Focused Build, SAP Focused Insights, SAP Focused Run and Cloud ALM.

Description:
Can you ensure that our PLC and SCADA systems are running smoothly thus enabling millions around the world to live a better life? Are you motivated by an open and frank working environment where colleagues team up to make excellent results and by the chance to make your ideas come to life.? Then you may be our new colleague in our IT & automation team in Insulin Manufacturing-1 (IM1), the world's largest high-tech insulin factory.

About the team and the Department
The IT & automation team consists of 17 skilled and committed employees and is part of the Business Support department with approximately 60 employees. The IT & automation team operate, maintain, and optimize the IT/automation systems in IM1 to meet both production needs and compliance requirements. Our team is built on widespread trust and responsibility, a positive and authentic dialogue where we bring our good spirits and look forward to making a difference together every day.


Your role will be together with your skilled colleagues to ensure daily operations of our PLC and SCADA systems. Everything from managing Life Cycle of the existing PLC installations to implementing new systems, as well as data analysis and problem solving will be an important part of your daily work.
In addition, you coordinate minor automation projects, and you will act as technical specialist and responsible for the PLC and SCADA area major cross-functional projects.

Job_title: Analytiker til strategisk planlægning af reinvesteringer i den danske jernbane
Description:
Vil du være med til at udvikle vores modeller til estimering af behovet for vedligehold og langsigtede reinvesteringer i jernbanen? Som analytiker kommer du med på et hold af knivskarpe kollegaer, der arbejder med modeller og analyser med henblik på optimering og udvikling af jernbanen. Det, synes vi, er stort.
I sektionen Strategisk Planlægning arbejder vi med dataunderstøttet langsigtet og strategisk planlægning af jernbaneinfrastrukturen. I denne stilling vil du få en unik mulighed for at præge vores modeller i et større udviklingsprojekt. Du vil få et stort ansvar og være med til at sikre fremtidens grønne og attraktive jernbane.
Strategisk Planlægning er en ung sektion, og du vil få 20 ambitiøse og dedikerede kollegaer med forskellige baggrunde lige fra astrofysik, økonomi og ingeniørvidenskab til en baggrund indenfor Human Ressources. Vi sætter pris på alles input og supplerer hinandens kompetencer i hverdagen, så vi kan udvikle os sammen og levere produkter af høj kvalitet.

Job_title: Systemingeniør til LEOPARD 2, hærens tungeste og mest komplekse platform - Her går barnedrømmen i opfyldelse og bliver til voksenliv med mening
Description:
Siger LEOPARD 2 Ingeniør- og Bjærgningskøretøj dig noget?

Brænder du for at arbejde med og få et indgående kendskab til Hærens tungeste og kraftigste køretøjer, LEOPARD 2 Ingeniør- og Bjærgningskøretøj?

Så er det nu du skal søge drømmejobbet og blive en del af et fagligt stolt Panser-team.
Om os
Kapacitetscenter Pansrede Køretøjer (KPK/i daglig tale ”Panser”) som du bliver en del af er en sektion under Kapacitetscenter Land, som er et af Forsvarsministeriets Materiel og Indkøbsstyrelsens (FMI) fire kapacitetsansvarsområder (Land, Maritim, Luft og IT).

I KPK er vi ansvarlig for indkøb, drift og udvikling af alle pansrede køretøjer fra anskaffelse til udfasning også kaldet ”fra vugge til grav”. Vi er 20 militære og civilt ansatte, alle med en stor faglighed, og selvom vi har travlt, omgiver vi os i hverdagen med en kammeratlig og humoristisk tone. Vi er her, fordi vi kan lide vores arbejde og er kendt som en sektion, hvor udskiftningen af personel er lille. Vi er i gang med at udvide personalestaben og har kolleger, der har været ansat siden sektionens start for ca. 16 år siden, og kolleger der er kommet til fornylig. Vi arbejder med teknisk komplicerede systemer, hvor faglighed og samarbejdsevner vægter tungt.
Du får fast tjenestested i FMI, Ballerup tæt på offentlige transportmidler, med egne P-pladser og kantine.

Description:
First and foremost, you are a technologist; a technical leader and strategic partner to your account teams. You see industry trends, align to overall corporate strategies and initiatives, and are able to translate these into a clear plan for your customers. You always put the team first and are the embodiment of a trusted advisor.
What You'll Do

Job_title: Teamleder til ny analysefunktion i Region H
Description:
Udadvendt akademiker til troværdige analyser og smart dataanvendelse.

Når direktion og fagchefer træffer langsigtede økonomiske beslutninger om hospitalsbyggerier og ejendomsdrift, skal de gøre det på baggrund af glasklare analyser, der bygger på solide data. Til dette arbejde opretter vi et nyt analyseteam.

Regionen forvalter 2 millioner kvadratmeter ejendomme, så selv mindre justeringer på byggerier eller ejendomsdrift kan have enorme økonomiske konsekvenser. Derfor opretter vi en ny data- og analyseenhed med i første omgang tre personer, der skal gøre det lettere for både controllere, fagchefer og direktion at træffe økonomiske beslutninger. Teamet bliver placeret centralt i økonomifunktionen hos Center for Ejendomme, der beskæftiger 1.000 medarbejdere og har et budget på 2,5 milliarder.

Teamet skal i første omgang bestå af tre personer med mulighed for at udvide teamet over tid. Medarbejderne er allerede på plads: Marie Louise er chefkonsulent og matematik-økonom med erfaring i økonomiske omkostningsmodeller og analyser til beslutningstagere. Frederik er fuldmægtig og ingeniør med stærke analytiske evner og indsigt i datamodellering via Power BI. Og så er der dig: Som ny teamleder skal du både bidrage fagligt til analyserne, være teamleder og øge samspillet med resten af organisationen.


Til at starte med skal du etablere en base for teamet i resten af organisationen samt skabe en god arbejdsdeling mellem jer tre. Herudover skal du sammen med teamet udvikle og være projektleder for:


Vi har allerede i dag masser af data, som økonomifunktionen faciliterer i velfungerende systemer for hele Center for Ejendomme. Men nogle data er redundante og skal opdateres særskilt, mens andre ikke er koblet tilstrækkeligt effektivt: Fx har vi ikke nok indsigt i, hvorvidt øgede energiudgifter primært skyldes stigende priser, eller at operationerne spredes over flere tider af døgnet. Den slags skal analyseteamet proaktivt belyse.


Der er mange veje til gode analyser. Vi forestiller os, at du er/har:


Selvom teamet arbejder med økonomiske analyser, behøver du ikke partout have en økonomisk baggrund. Det vigtigste er, at du kan lede os til dybdegående analyser, der gør det let for ledelsen at handle. Og at dit samspil med resten af organisationen udmønter sig i bedre brug af data.


Læs den uddybende jobprofil og kontakt Snorre Andersen fra Mercuri Urval på 60 37 80 63 for en fortrolig samtale.


Du ansættes i henhold til gældende overenskomst og forventeligt som chefkonsulent. Arbejdstiden er 37 timer pr. uge.

Arbejdsstedet er Stationsallén 42, Herlev.

Der mulighed for fri telefon samt hjemmearbejde efter aftale. Vi har gratis parkering, og der er mulighed for at deltage i medarbejderbetalt frokostordning.

Forventet ansættelse er senest den 1. juni 2023.


Vi foretrækker, at alle kandidater har været i dialog med Mercuri Urval forinden ansøgning.

Ansøgning og cv uploades i vores online rekrutteringssystem, senest den 11. april kl. 23:59.

Der indgår test i ansættelsesprocessen.

Are you a Software Engineer (a.k.a. Java Developer) seeking new challenges? Do you have the ambition to be part of a team of highly skilled Engineers? Then you might be the one we are looking for to join our Product Development department in Copenhagen!
Key about your role
In your role as a Java Developer/Software Engineer, you will be part of a multidisciplinary team of Business Analysts, Testers and Software Engineers, responsible for the development of everything from bug fixes to the implementation of new features. You won’t be alone, and can count on support from enthusiastic colleagues who are always happy to discuss solutions. However, as our application is complex, you will be expected to carry out proactive self-driven investigations. We strongly believe that the best argument should always win, independent of job title or seniority, and as such we look for engineers that will actively drive design discussions and in code reviews (we use Bitbucket intensively for such functions). This approach is also true for our processes: if you think we can optimise a process or a way of working, we strongly encourage you to share ideas with your team. In general, we try to be pragmatic: we use SCRUM but are not fanatical about it. Things must make sense. If not, we change it. We plan our tasks in two-week sprints, but we are agile and can reprioritise as and when required. Other key characteristics of your role include: you love driving initiatives, you are a team player, you are thorough; you have high ambitions for yourself, the code and our product. Pension knowledge and/or mathematical flair is an advantage but not a requirement.

Description:
Software Engineer
Wind Turbine Monitoring Systems
About the company
Brüel & Kjær Vibro is a leading independent supplier of safety and condition monitoring solutions for rotating machinery, i.e. wind turbines where large amounts of data are collected from sensors in the turbines and transmitted to central locations for analysis and diagnosis. Our solutions help monitor machine conditions and diagnose symptoms before these become actual failures. This way we are able to help our customers with increasing their machinery up-time and planning their maintenance work.

Er du visionær omkring fremtidens produktion og er du interesseret i at være med til at udvikle højteknologiske, avancerede løsninger til produktionsoptimering, så tag et kig på nedenstående
KILDE Automation leverer produktionslinjer, specialmaskiner og automationsløsninger til kunder, på tværs af brancher, både nationalt og internationalt.
Vi har gennem de seneste år udviklet en række nye maskiner, som vi med succes har introduceret i markedet. Desuden har vi igennem længere tid oplevet en stigende interesse for vores specialmaskiner og automationsløsninger og derfor skal du være med til at projektere, programmere, indkøre og idriftsætte PLC styrede specialmaskiner.
Du skal i samarbejde med den øvrige automationsafdeling skabe fundamentet for vores videreudvikling på markederne

Job_title: UI software developer – leading subsea technology
Description:
For our client, world leader within sonar technology – Teledyne RESON Marine, HEGSØ is looking for a UI desktop developer / C++ / C# Software Engineer.
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.

Software Engineer - Automation
Maersk is achieving an unprecedented transformation in the growth of our business, rethinking the way we engage with customers and partners, and how the world’s trade flows across our global network. From the farm to your refrigerator, or the factory to your wardrobe, we are developing solutions in-house that meet customer needs across the whole Supply Chain E2E. Joining Maersk you will join a global leader in Container Logistics as we embark on an industry-defining digital transformation that will revolutionize trade.
You’ll play a vital part in our success, helping us re-think what technology can do by using the latest technologies, and building the experience to advance your career. If you are passionate about working in an entrepreneurial environment supporting an ambitious, culturally diverse team of 3000 People within Maersk Technology – on a great transformation journey – then apply today!

The role of the Software Engineer

Job_title: Senior embedded software developer – leading subsea technology
Description:
Company Profile:
Teledyne Marine is a world leader in supplying high-quality underwater acoustic solutions, underwater autonomous vehicles, navigation systems and software with global presence and service facilities around the world. In the European part of Teledyne Marine, we are specialized in design, development, manufacturing, marketing and commissioning of advanced Multibeam sonar systems, Inertial Navigation Systems with Fiber Optic Gyro’s and software to manage sensors and systems and perform data processing. We operate in the hydrographic, offshore, dredging, defense & security and marine research business areas.
Job Purpose
The team support all sensor product lines from a shared software framework, delivering multiple embedded software systems based on same platform. The teamwork with logic/math execution in highly efficient C/C++ code, and mostly use Linux to run the embedded software.

Software Engineer at leading AI scale-up
We are looking for a skilled Software engineer, who will be part of our core team developing world-class AI solutions for customer service and support including chat/email/voicebots, live chat, AI assistance for ticket handling, and much more.
You will be joining a fast-growing start-up and an excellent team of experienced engineers and data scientists to create innovative software used by millions of users across the globe.
As a software engineer at SupWiz, you will be working on building new features for our core products, integrating our solution with platforms like ServiceNow and Zendesk, and developing key tools and functionalities for our internal innovation projects. You will also work closely together with our service delivery teams, to deliver an excellent experience for our customers and millions of end-users.

Job_title: UI/UX Intern at Valtech Aarhus - Fall 2023
Description:
Do you have to do an internship throughout your studies, and is it planned for fall 2023? And do you want a fast-paced internship where you get to work with some of the biggest brands in an international context? Then look no further.
Learn how to make great mistakes; come be our intern at Valtech's offices in Aarhus!

THE OPPORTUNITY
At Valtech, we are looking for awesome, curious, fearless, friendly interns for the UX and Design team. You will get to work with all aspects of your field of expertise, from workshops to pixel-perfecting, and you will never work alone.
At Valtech, we focus on matching the right people with the right task. That way, we do our best work, AND we have fun while doing it. And don’t worry if you are not quite sure what your “best work” is. We will help you figure this out.

Description:
We are looking for a PI Historian Lead Automation Engineer, who shares our passion, drive, and positive energy – what we call Genki – to join our Automation team.

You will join an organization focusing on people, and a steep learning curve as well as a diverse workplace with people driven to make a difference. Equally importantly, someone who wants to be a part of the largest growth journey that we in FUJIFILM have ever entered.
As the PI Historian Lead Automation Engineer, you possess a detailed knowledge in the AVEVA (OSIsoft) PI System and with experience in the pharmaceutical business using the PI system in a GMP environment. Knowledge about DCS Systems (DeltaV) and reporting Systems (InfoBatch and Crystal reports) is an advantage but not a requirement.
About the team
Reporting to the Automation Manager, you will be part of a team of more than 30 Automation Engineers. Automation is a part of the FDB cross site Platform organization. The position is local to Hillerød, Denmark and requires site presence.

Description:
Would you like to help us revolutionise the development and manufacturing of electronic, photonics, and optics industries? Welcome to ATLANT 3D – we invite you for an amazing journey where you will be a part of a team working towards disrupting 60 years of micro and nanofabrication technologies and systems. We offer you a once-in-a-lifetime experience. What we develop is unique, and we are incredibly excited to make a difference.
We are looking for a Machine Software Developer Engineer to build and deliver machine software control solutions for ATLANT 3D’s line of products ranging from implementing the software system architecture inclusive of real time controls, and data management. The software architecture should meet customer security and IP protection, interface to manufacturing factory standards as used in semiconductor manufacturing, and implementation of of-the-shelve solutions.

First and foremost, you are a technologist; a technical leader and strategic partner to your account teams. You see industry trends, align to overall corporate strategies and initiatives, and are able to translate these into a clear plan for your customers. You always put the team first and are the embodiment of a trusted advisor.
What You'll Do
You will partner with your account managers to help drive strategic deals in the midsize and above market for Cisco. These segments have a balance of a large customers, across commercial, service provider and public sector and is a dynamic and extremely fast-paced environment. You will often encounter challenges for which the rulebook doesn’t yet exist and your solutions will push the boundaries what the customers had thought possible. You will acts as a customer-focused technical sales professional who provides technical information and guidance in a dedicated manner. Directly accountable for specific business opportunities across the Cisco portfolio and across all architectures in a technology stack.

Description:
About WSA
WS Audiology combines over 140 years of experience in pioneering better solutions to help people with hearing loss. With a passion for impact, our around 12.000 employees are committed to achieving our purpose: wonderful sound for all. With brands like Signia, Widex, Audio Service, Rexton and Vibe, and with diverse assets across wholesale, retail, online, managed care and diagnostic solutions, we are active in over 125 markets. Going beyond together, we achieve annual revenues of around EUR 2 billion.

The Team
The team consist of highly skilled, dedicated, and experienced Software Test experts – collaborating with our Test Automation Architects, Test automation Engineers, System Integration, Software- and Security-Architects etc.

Description:
Let’s reimagine how the world moves.
As an international business on a high-tech journey, we don’t just transport millions of tons of cargo. We’re leading a digital revolution in global trade, creating opportunities for millions of customers around the world through new technology, data science, and artificial intelligence.
Growing your skills with Maersk means growing global trade and reinventing our industry, creating a digital foundation that moves the world. But it also means creating life-enhancing prosperity for people and communities through exciting initiatives.
Where will your technology career move next?
We are hiring for a SAP Automation Engineer with a strong knowledge and configuration experience on core SAP Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) processes and tools. You will use your multiple lifecycle implementation experience using various ALM tools - SAP Solution Manager, SAP Focused Build, SAP Focused Insights, SAP Focused Run and Cloud ALM.

Description:
Vi har i vores klimaplan navngivet en række projekter, som vi i de kommende år skal arbejde med. Vi vil være CO2 neutrale og klimarobuste i 2050, og vi ved noget af det vi skal have taget fat på, men ikke det hele. Hvis du er en der kan arbejde i krydsfeltet mellem at være den gode generalist og den der kan gøre komplekst stof forståeligt og samtidig sætte handling bag ordene, så er det lige dig vi mangler.
Du vil særligt komme til at arbejde indenfor områderne med oversvømmelse, tørke, skovrejsning og landbrug. I første omgang er der brug for at opbygge mere viden, end hvad vi allerede har. Viden om hvad der er brug for og hvad der er af mulige løsninger. Du vil komme til at samarbejde med en lang række af vores andre fagligheder for at kunne opnå den viden. Du vil også skulle arbejde med planlægning og borgerdialog, for at kunne lave realistiske tidsplaner. Når det bliver tid til at udføre projekterne, vil du have projektledelsen på nogle af dem, andre projekter vil du skulle være projektmedarbejder på.

Der mulighed for fri telefon samt hjemmearbejde efter aftale. Vi har gratis parkering, og der er mulighed for at deltage i medarbejderbetalt frokostordning.

Forventet ansættelse er senest den 1. juni 2023.


Vi foretrækker, at alle kandidater har været i dialog med Mercuri Urval forinden ansøgning.

Ansøgning og cv uploades i vores online rekrutteringssystem, senest den 11. april kl. 23:59.

Der indgår test i ansættelsesprocessen.
